original: sāsitabbapuggalavasena sāsanaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṃvarāsaṃvaranāmarūpānaṃ viya viniveṭhetabbāya

original: kathābhedañca yathārahaṃ paridīpaye”ti. Bhedanti ca nānattanti attho. Tesu piṭakesu

original: ca “āsayo”ti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ –

original: Idañca catubbidhaṃ āsayanti ettha sattā nivasantīti āsayoti vuccati. Anusayā kāmarāgabhavarāgadiṭṭhipaṭighavicikicchāmānāvijjāvasena

original: cetanā musāvādādisaddena voharīyati.

original: “alagaddo”ti vuccati. Atha vā alaṃ jīvitaharaṇe samattho gado assāti alagaddo. Nissaraṇatthāti
analyzed: alagaddo ti vuccati atha vā alam jīvita haraṇe samatthaḥ gadaḥ assa ati alagaddaḥ nissaraṇa atthā ati

analyzed: ettha bhaṇḍāgāre niyuttaḥ bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ viya bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ dhamma ratana anupālako

original: Aññaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti.

analyzed: duggahitā ati duṭṭhu gahitā duggahita bhāvam eva vibhāventaḥ āha upārambha ādi hetu pariyāpuṭā ti

analyzed: pariyāpuṇantaḥ tanti dhārako paveṇī pālako vaṃsa anurakkhako ca hutvā uggaṇhāti tena iva āha

original: Appamādena ovaditvāti “amhādisānampi evaṃ paccayā dullabhā, tumhe labhamānesu paccayesu

original: appamajjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ appamādena ovaditvā. Pallaṅkenāti samantato

original: ūrubaddhāsanena. Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvāti

original: ekaṃ phāṇitassa, ekaṃ sakkarāya pūrāpesi. Sesadvāresupi evameva kārāpesīti vadanti.

original: Sabhāyaṃ satasahassanti nagaramajjhe vinicchayasālāyaṃ satasahassaṃ. Iminā sakalanagarato

original: Diṭṭhigatānīti ettha diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigataṃ “gūthagataṃ muttagataṃ, saṅkhāragata”ntiādīsu

original: tasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantassa sukhavihārābhāvato taṃ pahāya icchitabbasukhavihāramattaṃ

analyzed: pabbatam dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena ati ettha dhammo ti bhūtam vatthu vinayo ti

original: saññāpesīti kukkuccāyitamatthaṃ bodhesi. Kathaṃ saññāpesīti āha “so kirā”tiādi. Cittarūpanti
analyzed: saññāpesi iti kukkuccāyitam attham bodhesi katham saññāpesi iti āha so kirāti ādi citta rūpan ti

analyzed: sāsanam manasi kareyyam bahu vata me katam assa ati evam maraṇa ssatiyāḥ anuyuñjanataḥ

original: Passāsoti antopavisanavāto. Vuttavipariyāyenapi vadanti.

analyzed: attho āgum na karoti iti nāgaḥ iti vacanato pāpa karaṇa abhāvato samaṇaḥ idha nāgaḥ nāma ati

original: maññamānā “eko taṃ mahārāja samaṇanāgo dakkhiṇahatthe gaṇhissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Abbāhiṃsūti

analyzed: katanti vadanti bāhiratoti uyyānassa bāhirato passantānam ati dukkaram hutvā paññāyati iti

original: natthi. Sīmaṃ akkamitvāti antosīmaṃ sīmāya abbhantaraṃ akkamitvā. Abhiññāpādakanti
analyzed: natthi sīmam akkamitvā ati antosīmam sīmāya abbhantaram akkamitvā abhiññāpādakam ti

original: rukkhadevaputtena chattaṃ katvā dhāritarājāyatano nāgadīpaṃ samāgantvā saṅgāmamajjhe
analyzed: rukkhadeva puttena chattam katvā dhārita rāja āyatanaḥ nāga dīpam samāgantvā saṅgāma majjhe

original: ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno ghorandhakārena nāge santāsetvā assāsento ālokaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: ākāse pallaṅkena nisinnaḥ ghora andhakārena nāge santāsetvā assāsentaḥ ālokam dassetvā

original: sañjātapītisomanassānaṃ upagatanāgānaṃ sāmaggikaraṇīyaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā mātulabhāgineyyehi
analyzed: sañjāta pīti somanassānam upagata nāgānam sāmaggi karaṇīyam dhammam desetvā mātula bhāgineyyehi

original: dvīhi nāgarājūhi pūjite pathavītalagate maṇipallaṅke nisinno nāgehi dibbannapānehi
analyzed: dvīhi nāga rājūhi pūjite pathavī tala gate maṇi pallaṅke nisinnaḥ nāgehi dibbanna pānehi

original: santappito jalathalanivāsino asītikoṭināge saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi
analyzed: santappitaḥ jala thala nivāsinaḥ asīti koṭi nāge saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi

original: namassituṃ pallaṅkañca rājāyatanapādapañca tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā jambudīpamagamāsi.
analyzed: namassitum pallaṅkam ca rājāyatana pādapam tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā jambudīpam agamāsi

original: Tatiyampi abhisambodhito aṭṭhame saṃvacchare mahodaramātulena maṇiakkhikanāgarājenābhiyācito
analyzed: tatiyam pi abhisambodhito aṭṭhame saṃvacchare mahodara mātulena maṇiakkhika nāga rājena abhiyācito

original: visākhapuṇṇamadivase pañcabhikkhusataparivuto kalyāṇīpadese maṇiakkhikassa bhavanamupagantvā
analyzed: visākha puṇṇama divase pañca bhikkhu sata parivutaḥ kalyāṇī padese maṇiakkhikassa bhavanam upagantvā

original: tattha māpitaruciraratanamaṇḍape manoharavarapallaṅke nisinno nāgarājena dibbannapānehi
analyzed: tattha māpita rucira ratana maṇḍape manohara vara pallaṅke nisinnaḥ nāga rājena dibba anna pānehi

original: santappetvā nāgamāṇavikagaṇaparivutena dibbamālāgandhādīhi pūjito tattha dhammaṃ
analyzed: santappetvā nāga māṇavika gaṇa parivutena dibba mālā gandha ādīhi pūjitaḥ tattha dhammaṃ

original: desetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā sumanakūṭe padaṃ dassetvā pabbatapāde divāvihāraṃ katvā dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne
analyzed: desetvā vuṭṭhāya āsanā sumana kūṭe padam dassetvā pabbata pāde divāvihāram katvā dīgha vāpi cetiya ṭṭhāne

original: ca mubhiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇīcetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhiṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmaṭṭhāne
analyzed: ca mubhiyaṅgaṇa cetiya ṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇīcetiya ṭṭhāne ca mahābodhiṭṭhāne ca thūpa ārāma ṭṭhāne

original: ca mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca sasāvako nisīditvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā silācetiyaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: ca mahā cetiya ṭṭhāne ca sa sāvakaḥ nisīditvā nirodha samāpattim samāpajjitvā silā cetiya ṭṭhāne iva iva

original: ṭhatvā devanāge samanusāsitvā jambudīpamagamāsi. Evaṃ bhagavā dharamānakālepi imaṃ
analyzed: deva nāge samanusāsitvā jambudīpam agamāsi evam bhagavā dharamāna kāle pi imam

original: dīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ āgamāsīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: dīpam tikkhattum āgamāsi iti veditabbam

original: Idāni tadeva tikkhattumāgamanaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvento āha “paṭhamaṃ yakkhadamanattha”ntiādi.
analyzed: idāni tat eva tikkhattum āgamanam saṅkhepataḥ vibhāventaḥ āha paṭhamam yakkha damana attha ntiādi

original: Rakkhaṃ karontoti yakkhānaṃ puna apavisanatthāya rakkhaṃ karonto. Āvijjīti samantato
analyzed: rakkham karontaḥ ti yakkhānam puna a pavisana atthāya rakkham karontaḥ āvijji iti samantataḥ

original: vicari. Mātulabhāgineyyānanti cūḷodaramahodarānaṃ. Ettha pana kiñcāpi bhagavā samiddhasumanena
analyzed: mātula bhāgineyyā ananti cūḷodara mahodarānaṃ ettha pana kiñca api bhagavā samiddha sumanena

original: nāma devaputtena saddhiṃ āgato, tathāpi pacchāsamaṇena ekenapi bhikkhunā saddhiṃ
analyzed: nāma deva puttena saddhim āgato tathā api pacchāsamaṇena ekena api bhikkhunā saddhim

original: anāgatattā “ekakova āgantvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadanurūpassa paripanthassa vihatattā “pariḷāhaṃ
analyzed: anāgata ttā ekakaḥ vā āgantvā iti vuttam tad anurūpassa paripanthassa vihata ttā pariḷāham

original: vūpasametvā”ti vuttaṃ. Rañño bhātāti rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā. Abhayoti mattābhayo.
analyzed: vūpasametvā iti vuttam raññaḥ bhātā ati raññaḥ kaniṭṭha bhātā abhayo ti mattābhayo

original: Anuḷā devīti rañño jeṭṭhabhātujāyā anuḷā devī. Purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
analyzed: anuḷā devī iti raññaḥ jeṭṭhabhātu jāyā anuḷā devī purimakānam tiṇṇam sammāsambuddhānam

original: bodhi patiṭṭhāsīti yadā hi so kakusandho nāma bhagavā imasmiṃ dīpe manusse pajjarakābhibhūte
analyzed: bodhi patiṭṭhāsi iti yadā hi saḥ kakusandhaḥ nāma bhagavā imasmin dīpe manusse pajjaraka abhibhūte

original: anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā karuṇāya sañcoditahadayo imaṃ dīpamāgato, tadā taṃ rogabhayaṃ
analyzed: anaya byasanam āpajjante disvā karuṇāya sañcodita hadayaḥ imam dīpam āgataḥ tadā tam roga bhayam

original: vūpasametvā sannipatitānaṃ dhammaṃ desento caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ
analyzed: vūpasametvā sannipatitānam dhammam desento caturāsītiyā pāṇa sahassānam dhamma abhisamayam

original: katvā sāyanhasamaye bodhipatiṭṭhānārahaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
analyzed: katvā sāyanha samaye bodhi patiṭṭhāna araha ṭṭhānam gantvā tattha samāpattim samāpajjitvā

original: vuṭṭhāya “mama sirīsamahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya rucanandā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū”ti
analyzed: vuṭṭhāya mama sirīsa mahābodhitaḥ dakkhiṇa mahā sākham ādāya rucanandā bhikkhunī idha āgacchatu uti

analyzed: sā satthu cittam ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññā iva khemavatī rājadhāniyā khema rājānam ādāya

original: mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ khemarājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ
analyzed: mahābodhim upagantvā dakkhiṇa mahā sākhāya manosilā lekham khemarājena dāpetvā tam sayam

original: chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīhi ceva devatāhi
analyzed: chijjitvā suvaṇṇa kaṭāhe ṭhitam bodhisākham ādāya pañca sata bhikkhunīhi ca iva devatāhi

analyzed: ca parivāritāḥ iddhiyā idha ānetvā tathāgatena pasārite dakkhiṇa hatthe sa suvaṇṇa kaṭāham

original: mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ tathāgato abhayassa nāma rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahātitthavana”nti
analyzed: mahā bodhim ṭhapesi tam tathāgataḥ abhayassa nāma raññaḥ da tvā tena tasmin samaye mahā titthavanan ti

original: paññāte mahāmeghavanuyyāne patiṭṭhāpesi.
analyzed: paññāte mahā meghavan uyyāne patiṭṭhāpesi

original: Koṇāgamano ca bhagavā dubbuṭṭhipīḷite dīpavāsino disvā imaṃ dīpamāgato taṃ bhayaṃ
analyzed: ca bhagavā dubbuṭṭhi pīḍite dīpa vāsinaḥ disvā imam dīpam āgataḥ tam bhayam

original: vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pubbabodhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇa sahassāni magga phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pubba bodhiṭṭhānam

analyzed: bhikkhunī idha āgacchatu uti cintesi sā bhagavataḥ adhippāyam viditvā

analyzed: sobha rājadhāniyā sobha rājānam ādāya mahābodhim upagantvā dakkhiṇa mahā sākhāya manosilālekham

analyzed: saddhim sura gaṇa parivutāḥ iddhiyā idha āharitvā satthārā pasārita dakkhiṇa pāṇi tale sa hema kaṭāham

analyzed: saṅkhyam gate mahā meghavan uyyāne mahā bodhim patiṭṭhāpesi

original: Kassapopi ca bhagavā upaṭṭhitarājūparājayuddhena pāṇino vināsaṃ disvā karuṇāya codito
analyzed: kassapaḥ api ca bhagavā upaṭṭhita rāja uparāja yuddhena pāṇinaḥ vināsam disvā karuṇāya coditaḥ

original: “mama nigrodhamahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya sudhammā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū”ti
analyzed: mama nigrodha mahābodhitaḥ dakkhiṇa mahā sākham ādāya sudhammā bhikkhunī idha āgacchatu uti

analyzed: sā bhagavataḥ cittam viditvā taṅkhaṇaññā iva bārāṇasī rājadhāniyāḥ brahmadatta rājānam ādāya

analyzed: sammāsambuddhānam bodhim patiṭṭhāpesi tam sandhāya evam āha imasmin ca mahā rāja dīpe

original: purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhāsī”ti.
analyzed: purimakānam tiṇṇam sammāsambuddhānam bodhi patiṭṭhāsi iti

original: Sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakenāti siniddhatāya rasavantaṃ ojavantaṃ abhinavaraṃsijālaṃ
analyzed: sa rasa raṃsi jāla vissajjanakena ati sinidh hatāya rasavantam ojavantam abhinava raṃsi jālam

original: vissajjentena. Atha vā ito cito ca saṃsaraṇato sarasaṃ sajīvaṃ jīvamānaṃ viya raṃsijālaṃ
analyzed: atha vā itas citas ca saṃsaraṇataḥ sa rasam sa jīvam jīvamānam viya raṃsi jālam

original: vissajjentena. Atha vā sarasakāle dharamānakāle buddhena viya raṃsijālaṃ muñcantenāti
analyzed: vissajjentena atha vā sarasa kāle dharamāna kāle buddhena raṃsi jālam muñcantena ati

original: evamettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Ekadivaseneva agamāsīti sambandho. Pañcahi kaññāsatehīti
analyzed: evam ettha attham vaṇṇayanti eka divasena iva agamāsi iti sambandho pañcahi kaññā satehi iti

original: attano paricārikehi pañcahi kaññāsatehi. Upassayaṃ kārāpetvāti bhikkhunupassayaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ paricārikehi pañcahi kaññā satehi upassayam kārāpetvā ati bhikkhun upassayam

original: kārāpetvā. Appesīti lekhasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Evañca avocāti rājasandesaṃ appetvā
analyzed: kārāpetvā appesi iti lekha sāsanam patiṭṭhāpesi evañca avoca ati rāja sandesam appetvā

original: therassa mukhasāsanaṃ viññāpento evaṃ avoca. Udikkhatīti apekkhati pattheti.
analyzed: therassa mukha sāsanam viññāpentaḥ evam avoca udikkhati iti apekkhati pattheti

original: Chinnahatthaṃ viyāti chinnahatthavantaṃ viya. Chinnā hatthā etassāti chinnahatthoti
analyzed: chinna hattham viya iti chinna hatthavantam viya chinnāḥ hatthāḥ etassa ati chinna hatthaḥ iti

original: aññapadatthasamāso daṭṭhabbo. Pabbajjāpurekkhārāti pabbajjābhimukhā, pabbajjāya sañjātābhilāsā
analyzed: añña padattha samāsaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ pabbajjā purekkhārā ati pabbajja abhimukhā pabbajjāya sañjāta abhilāsā

original: “kadā nu kho pabbajissāmī”ti tattha ussukkamāpannāti vuttaṃ hoti. Maṃ paṭimānetīti
analyzed: kadā nu kho pabbajissāmi iti tattha ussukkam āpannā ati vuttam hoti mama paṭimāneti iti

original: maṃ udikkhati. Satthena ghātaṃ na arahatīti asatthaghātārahaṃ. Himavalāhakagabbhanti
analyzed: mam udikkhati satthena ghātam na arahati iti a sattha ghāta araham hima valāhaka gabbhanti

original: himapuṇṇavalāhakagabbhaṃ. Pāṭihāriyavasena jātaṃ himameva “valāhakagabbha”ntipi vadanti.
analyzed: hima puṇṇa valāhaka gabbham pāṭihāriya vasena jātam himam eva valāhaka gabbham ti pi vadanti

original: Doṇamattāti magadhanāḷiyā soḷasanāḷippamāṇā.
analyzed: magadha nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷippamāṇā

original: Magganti sattayojanikaṃ maggaṃ. Paṭijaggāpetvāti sodhāpetvā, khāṇukaṇṭakādīni harāpetvā
analyzed: magganti satta yojanikam maggam paṭijaggāpetvā iti sodhāpetvā khāṇu kaṇṭaka ādīni harāpetvā

original: tattha bahalavipulavālukaṃ okirāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kammāravaṇṇanti rañño pakatisuvaṇṇakāravaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: tattha bahala vipula vālukam okirāpetvā iti vuttam hoti kammāra vaṇṇam ti rañño pakati suvaṇṇa kāra vaṇṇam

original: Navahatthaparikkhepanti navahatthappamāṇo parikkhepo assāti navahatthaparikkhepaṃ,
analyzed: nava hattha parikkhepanti nava hattha ppamāṇaḥ parikkhepaḥ assa ati nava hattha parikkhepam

original: parikkhepato navahatthappamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pañcahatthubbedha”ntiādīsupi imināva
analyzed: parikkhepataḥ nava hattha ppamāṇanti vuttam hoti pañca hatthubbedha ntiādīsu pi iminā ava

original: nayena attho veditabbo. Tihatthavikkhambhanti tihatthappamāṇavitthāraṃ. Samussitadhajapaṭākanti
analyzed: nayena atthaḥ veditabbo ti hattha vikkhambhanti ti hattha ppamāṇa vitthāram samussita dhaja paṭākanti

original: ussāpitanīlapītādivividhadhajapaṭākaṃ. Nānāratanavicittanti tattha tattha racitanānāratanehi
analyzed: ussāpita nīla pīta ādi vividha dhaja paṭākam tattha tattha racita nānā ratanehi

original: suvicittaṃ. Anekālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitanti pasannajanapūjitehi hatthūpagādīhi nānālaṅkārehi
analyzed: su vicittam aneka alaṅkāra paṭimaṇḍitam ti pasanna jana pūjitehi hatthūpaga ādīhi nānā alaṅkārehi

original: sajjitaṃ. Nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇanti upahāravasena upanītehi nānappakārehi vaṇṇagandhasampannehi
analyzed: sajjitam nānāvidha kusuma samākiṇṇanti upahāra vasena upanītehi nānappakārehi vaṇṇa gandha sampannehi

original: jalathalapupphehi ākiṇṇaṃ. Anekatūriyasaṅghuṭṭhanti ātabhavitatādipañcaṅgikatūriyasaṅghositaṃ.
analyzed: jala thala pupphehi ākiṇṇam aneka tūriya saṅghuṭṭhanti ātabha vitata ādi pañcaṅgika tūriya saṅghositam

original: Avasesaṃ adassanaṃ agamāsīti ettha “handa, mahārāja, tayā gahetabbā ayaṃ sākhā, tassa
analyzed: avasesam a dassanam agamāsi iti ettha handa mahā rāja tayā gahetabbā ayam sākhā tassa

original: upanissayabhūto ayaṃ khandho, na mayaṃ tayā gahetabbā”ti vadantā viya avasesā sākhā
analyzed: upanissaya bhūtaḥ ayam khandho na mayam tayā gahetabbā ti vadantā viya avasesā sākhā

original: satthu tejasā adassanamagamaṃsūti vadanti. Gavakkhajālasadisanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ,

original: mahābodhiṃ pūjesiyeva, tasmā tena saddhiṃ catutthamidaṃ rajjasampadānaṃ. Mahābodhiṃ
analyzed: mahā bodhim tasmā tena saddhim catuttham idam rajja sampadānam mahā bodhim

original: pana yasmiṃ yasmiṃ divase rajjena pūjesi, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ divase sakalajambudīparajjato
analyzed: pana yasmin yasmin divase rajjena pūjesi tasmin tasmin divase sakala jambudīpa rajjataḥ

original: uppannaṃ āyaṃ gahetvā mahābodhipūjaṃ kāresi.
analyzed: uppannam āyam gahetvā mahā bodhi pūjam kāresi

original: Māgasiramāsassāti migasiramāsassa. Paṭhamapāṭipadadivaseti sukkapakkhapāṭipadadivase.
analyzed: māgasira māsassa ati migasira māsassa paṭhama pāṭipada divase iti sukka pakkha pāṭipada divase

original: Tañhi kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ apekkhitvā “paṭhamapāṭipadadivasa”nti vuccati. Idañca
analyzed: tat hi kaṇha pakkha pāṭipada divasam apekkhitvā paṭhama pāṭipada divasam ti vuccati idam ca

original: imasmiṃ dīpe pavattamānavohāraṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Tattha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva

original: aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti vohārassa pavattattā tena vohārena “dutiyapāṭipadadivase”ti
analyzed: aparā puṇṇamī tāva ekaḥ māso ti vohārassa pavatta ttā tena vohārena dutiya pāṭipada divasā iti

original: vattabbaṃ siyā. Tattha hi kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ “paṭhamapāṭipada”nti vuccati.
analyzed: vattabbam siyā tattha hi kaṇha pakkha pāṭipada divasam paṭhama pāṭipadam ti vuccati

original: Ukkhipitvāti mahāsālamūle dinnehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ ukkhipitvāti
analyzed: ukkhipitvā iti mahā sāla mūle dinnehi soḷasahi jāti sampanna kulehi saddhim ukkhipitvā ati

original: vadanti. Gacchati vatareti ettha areti khede. Tenevāha “kanditvā”ti, bodhiyā adassanaṃ
analyzed: vadanti gacchati ettha ara iti khede tena iva āha kanditvā ati bodhiyā adassanam

original: asahamāno roditvā paridevitvāti attho. Sarasaraṃsijālanti ettha pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
analyzed: asahamānaḥ roditvā paridevitvā iti attho sarasa raṃsi jālanti ettha pana heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva

original: attho veditabbo. Mahābodhisamāruḷhāti mahābodhinā samāruḷhā. Passato passatoti anādare
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ mahā bodhi samāruḷhā ati mahā bodhinā samāruḷhā passataḥ passataḥ ti anādare

original: sāmivacanaṃ, passantassevāti attho. Mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhantāti mahāsamuddassa udakatalaṃ

original: pakkhandi. Samantā yojananti samantato ekekena passena yojanappamāṇe padese. Accantasaṃyoge

original: cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Vīciyo vūpasantāti vīciyo na uṭṭhahiṃsu, nāhesunti vuttaṃ hoti.

original: Pavajjiṃsūti viraviṃsu, nādaṃ pavattayiṃsūti attho. Rukkhādisannissitāhīti ettha

original: Supaṇṇarūpenāti supaṇṇasadisena rūpena. Nāgakulāni santāsesīti mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ

original: Vipphurantāti vipphurantā ito cito ca saṃsarantā. Nicchariṃsūti nikkhamiṃsu. Dassiṃsūti

original: “Tavakkabrāhmaṇagāme, thūpārāme tatheva ca;

analyzed: upāya matta nidassananti atthaḥ mukham dvāram upāyaḥ iti hi atthataḥ ekam tena hi bhikkhave

original: bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti pāḷiṃ dassetvā tattha paṭiniddesamāha “yena
analyzed: bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññapessāmi iti pāḷim dassetvā tattha paṭiniddesam āha yena

original: sudinno”tiādinā. Tenāti hetuatthe karaṇavacanattā tassa paṭiniddesopi tādisoyevāti

original: āha “yasmā paṭisevī”ti. Pubbe atthato siddhenāti pubbe uppannamethunadhammapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaatthato
analyzed: āha yasmā paṭisevi iti pubbe atthataḥ siddhena ati pubbe uppanna methuna dhamma paṭisevana saṅkhāta atthato

original: siddhena. Pacchā atthato siddhenāti raññā adinnaṃ dārūnaṃ ādiyanasaṅkhātapacchāuppannaatthato
analyzed: siddhena pacchā atthataḥ siddhena ati raññā adinnam ādiyana saṅkhāta pacchā uppanna atthato

original: siddhena. Samayasaddoti etassa “dissatī”ti iminā sambandho.
analyzed: siddhena samaya saddo ti etassa dissati iti iminā sambandhaḥ

original: Samavāyeti paccayasāmaggiyaṃ, kāraṇasamavāyeti attho. Khaṇeti okāse. Assāti assa

analyzed: samaya saddassa samavāyaḥ atthaḥ ti sambandhaḥ appa eva nāma sve pi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca

analyzed: tassa iva paccaya sāmaggī atthataḥ tad anurūpam sarīra balam ca iva tad paccaya parissaya abhāvaḥ

analyzed: gahetvā upadhāretvā ti atthaḥ idam vuttam hoti sace amhākam sve gamanassa yutta kālo

original: bhavissati, kāye balamattā ceva pharissati, gamanapaccayā ca añño aphāsuvihāro na

analyzed: eva nāma sve āgaccheyyāma ati

original: Uggāhamāno tiādīsu mānoti tassa paribbājakassa pakatināmaṃ, kiñci kiñci pana uggahetuṃ

original: Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasañchanno ārāmoti katvā

original: ārāme. Paṭivasatīti tasmiṃ vāsaphāsutāya vasati.
analyzed: ārāme paṭivasati iti tasmin vāsaphāsutāya vasati

analyzed: samparetabbataḥ sampāpuṇitabbataḥ samparāyaḥ para lokaḥ tattha niyuttaḥ samparāyikaḥ

original: paralokattho. Atthābhisamayāti yathāvuttaubhayatthasaṅkhātahitapaṭilābhā. Samparāyikopi

original: etassa atthīti dhīro.
analyzed: etassa atthi iti dhīraḥ

original: Sammā mānābhisamayāti mānassa sammā pahānena. Sammāti iminā mānassa aggamaggañāṇena

original: samucchedappahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhotiādīsu dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino

original: hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ, pīḷanameva attho pīḷanaṭṭho, tthakārassa ṭṭhakāraṃ

analyzed: katvā vuttam evam sesesu pi paccayehi kata bhāvaḥ saṅkhataṭṭhaḥ santāpaḥ dukkha dukkha tā ādi vasena

analyzed: santāpanam paridahanam vipariṇāmaḥ jarāya maraṇena ca ati dvidhā vipariṇāmetabba tā

original: Abhisametabbo paṭivijjhitabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayova attho abhisamayaṭṭho, pīḷanādīni.

analyzed: visaya bhāva upagamana sāmaññataḥ ekattena vuttāni

original: dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
analyzed: dhammānam aviparītaḥ sabhāvaḥ abhimukha bhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhati iti abhisamayaḥ

original: dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.

original: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ paṭicca saddā abhinivisanti, na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti?

original: Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite. Saddavisese hi apekkhiyamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ
analyzed: saccam etam sadda visese apekkhite sadda visese hi apekkhiyamāne ekena saddena aneka attha abhidhānam

original: na sambhavati. Na hi yo kālattho samayasaddo, soyeva samūhādiatthaṃ vadati. Ettha
analyzed: na sambhavati na hi yaḥ kāla atthaḥ samaya saddo samūha ādi attham vadati ettha

original: pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ samayasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samayasaddassa

original: vuttā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāre adhippāyo veditabbo. Idha panassa kālo atthoti

original: assa samayasaddassa idha kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato desadesakādīnaṃ
analyzed: assa samaya saddassa idha kālaḥ attho samavāya ādīnam atthānam idha asambhavataḥ desa desaka ādīnam

original: viya nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
analyzed: viya nidāna bhāvena kālassa ca

original: Upayogavacanena bhummavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha karaṇavacanena niddese payojanaṃ
analyzed: upayoga vacanena bhumma vacanena ca niddesam a katvā idha karaṇa vacanena niddese payojanam

original: niddhāretukāmo parammukhena codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti “etthāhā”tiādi. Ettha “tena samayenā”ti
analyzed: niddhāretu kāmo parammukhena codanam samuṭṭhāpeti ettha āha atiādi ettha tena samayena ati

analyzed: kato ti yojetabbam ettha api yathā ati idam ānetvā sambandhitabbam tattha ati tesu sutta abhidhammesu

original: Tathāti upayogabhummavacanehi. Idhāti imasmiṃ vinaye. Aññathāti karaṇavacanena. Accantamevāti

original: ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ, tāva accantameva, nirantaramevāti attho.
analyzed: ārambhataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva desanā niṭṭhānam tāva accantam eva nirantaram eva ati attho

original: Karuṇāvihārenāti parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena. Tathā hi karuṇānidānattā
analyzed: karuṇā vihārena ati para hita paṭipatti saṅkhātena karuṇā vihārena tathā hi karuṇā nidānattā

original: desanāya idha parahitapaṭipatti “karuṇāvihāro”ti vuttā, na pana karuṇāsamaāpattivihāro.
analyzed: desanāya idha para hita paṭipatti karuṇā vihāraḥ ti vuttā na pana karuṇā samaāpatti vihāro

original: Na hi desanākāle desetabbadhammavisayassa desanāñāṇassa sattavisayāya mahākaruṇāya
analyzed: na hi desanā kāle desetabba dhamma visayassa desanā ñāṇassa satta visayāya mahā karuṇāya

original: sahuppatti sambhavati bhinnavisayattā, tasmā karuṇāvasena pavatto parahitapaapattisaṅkhāto
analyzed: sahuppatti sambhavati bhinna visaya ttā tasmā karuṇā vasena pavattaḥ para hita paapatti saṅkhāto

original: vihāro idha karuṇāvihāroti veditabbo. Tadatthajotanatthanti accantasaṃyogatthadīpanatthaṃ
analyzed: vihāraḥ idha karuṇā vihāraḥ iti veditabbo tad attha jotana ttham ti accanta saṃyoga ttha dīpana ttham

original: anuggahakaraṇaṃ. Pabbajitānuggahakaraṇanti uggahaparipucchānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa
analyzed: anuggaha karaṇam pabbajita anuggaha karaṇam ti uggaha paripucchānam kammaṭṭhāna anuyogassa

original: ca anurūpavasanaṭṭhānapariggahenettha pabbajitānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ca anurūpa vasana ṭṭhāna pariggahena ittha pabbajitānam anuggaha karaṇam

original: Paccayaggahaṇeneva paccayaparibhogasiddhito āha “tathā purimena…pe… vivajjananti.
analyzed: paccaya ggahaṇena iva paccaya paribhoga siddhitaḥ āha tathā

original: Tattha purimenāti verañjāvacanena. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Tassa
analyzed: tattha purimena ati verañjā vacanena āhitaḥ ahaṃmānaḥ ettha ati attā atta bhāvaḥ tassa

original: kilamatho kilantabhāvo attakilamatho, attapīḷā attadukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti, tassa anuyogo
analyzed: kilamatho kilantabhāvaḥ attakilamatho attapīḷā attadukkhanti vuttam hoti tassa anuyogo

original: karaṇaṃ attakilamathānuyogo, upavāsakaṇṭakāpassayaseyyādinā attano dukkhuppādananti
analyzed: karaṇam atta kilamatha anuyogaḥ upavāsa kaṇṭaka apassaya seyya ādinā attanaḥ dukkha uppādanan ti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa vivajjanaṃ attakilamathānuyogavivajjanaṃ. Antogāme vasantānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam hoti tassa vivajjanam atta kilamatha anuyoga vivajjanam antogāme vasantānam

original: anicchantānampi visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇadassanādisambhavato bahigāme patirūpaṭṭhāne
analyzed: an icchantānam pi visa bhāga rūpa ādi ārammaṇa dassana ādi sambhavataḥ bahigāme patirūpa ṭhāne

original: vasantānaṃ tadabhāvato āha “pacchimena vatthukāmappahānato”tiādi. Tattha pacchimenāti
analyzed: tad abhāvataḥ āha pacchimena vatthu kāma ppahānato tiādi tattha pacchimena ati

original: naḷerupucimandamūlavacanena. Kilesakāmassa vatthubhūtattā rūpādayo pañca kāmaguṇā
analyzed: kilesa kāmassa rūpa ādayo pañca kāma guṇā

original: vatthukāmo, tassa pahānaṃ vatthukāmappahānaṃ. Kāmasukhallikānuyogavivajjanupāyadassananti
analyzed: vatthu kāmaḥ tassa pahānam vatthu kāma ppahānam kāma sukhallikā anuyoga vivajjana upāya dassanam ti

original: vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasaṃyuttassa sukhassa yogo anuyogo anubhavo, tassa parivajjane upāyadassanaṃ.
analyzed: vatthu kāmesu kilesa kāma saṃyuttassa sukhassa yogaḥ anuyogaḥ anubhavaḥ tassa parivajjane upāya dassanam

original: Sayameva gocaragāmaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano dhammassavanānurūpabhabbapuggalānaṃ dassanato
analyzed: sayam eva gocara gāmam upasaṅkamitvā attanaḥ dhamma ssavana anurūpa bhabba puggalānam dassanato

original: dhammadesanāya kālo sampatto nāma hotīti dhammadesanāya abhiyogo viññāyatīti āha
analyzed: dhamma desanāya kālo sampattaḥ nāma hoti iti dhamma desanāya abhiyogaḥ viññāyati iti āha

original: “purimena ca dhammadesanābhiyoga”nti. Dhammadesanāya saussāhabhāvo dhammadesanābhiyogo.
analyzed: purimena ca dhamma desanā abhiyogam ti dhamma desanāya saussāha bhāvaḥ dhamma desanā abhiyogaḥ

original: Bahigāme vivittokāse vasantassa ākiṇṇavihārābhāvato kāyavivekādīsu adhimutti tappoṇatā
analyzed: bahigāme vivitta ukāse vasantassa ākiṇṇa vihāra abhāvataḥ kāya viveka ādīsu adhimutti tad poṇa tā

original: viññāyatīti āha “pacchimena vivekādhimutti”nti.
analyzed: viññāyati iti āha pacchimena viveka adhimuttim ti

original: Dhammadesanābhiyogavivekādhimuttīnaṃ hetubhūtā eva karuṇāpaññā dhammadesanāya upagamanassa
analyzed: dhamma desanā abhiyoga viveka adhimuttīnam hetu bhūtā eva karuṇā paññā dhamma desanāya upagamanassa

original: tato apagamanassa kāraṇabhūtā hontīti āha “purimena karuṇāya upagamana”ntiādi. Karuṇāpaññāyeva
analyzed: tatas apagamanassa kāraṇa bhūtāḥ honti iti āha purimena karuṇāya upagamana ntiādi karuṇā paññāya iva

original: hi anantaradukassa hetū honti. Etena ca karuṇāya upagamanaṃ na lābhādinimittaṃ, paññāya
analyzed: hi anantara dukassa hetū honti etena ca karuṇāya upagamanam na lābha ādi nimittam paññāya

original: apagamanaṃ na virodhādinimittanti upagamanāpagamanānaṃ nirupakkilesataṃ vibhāvibhanti
analyzed: apagamanam na virodha ādi nimittam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhimuttatanti tanninnabhāvaṃ. Nirupalepananti anupalepanaṃ anallīyanaṃ.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam adhimutta tanti tad ninna bhāvam nirupalepananti anupalepanam an allīyanam

original: Dhammikasukhāpariccāganimittanti ettha dhammikasukhaṃ nāma anavajjasukhaṃ. Tañhi
analyzed: dhammika sukha a pariccāga nimittan ti ettha dhammika sukham nāma anavajja sukham tat hi

original: dhammikaṃ lābhaṃ paṭicca uppannattā “dhammikasukha”nti vuccati. Uttarimanussadhammābhiyoganimittaṃ
analyzed: dhammikam lābham paṭicca uppanna ttā dhammika sukhanti vuccati uttari manussa dhamma abhiyoga nimittam

original: phāsuvihāranti sambandho. Manussānaṃ upakārabahulatanti paccayapaṭiggahaṇadhammadesanādivasena
analyzed: phāsu vihāram ti sambandhaḥ manussānam upakāra bahula tanti paccaya paṭiggahaṇa dhamma desanā ādi vasena

original: upakārabahulataṃ. Devatānaṃ upakārabahulataṃ janavivittatāya. Pacurajanavivittañhi
analyzed: upakāra bahula tam devatānam upakāra bahula tam jana vivitta tāya pacura jana vivittam hi

original: ṭhānaṃ devā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññanti. Loke saṃvaḍḍhabhāvanti āmisopabhogena saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhānam devāḥ upasaṅkamitabbam maññanti loke saṃvaḍḍha bhāvanti āmisa upabhogena saṃvaḍḍhita bhāvam

original: Ekapuggaloti ettha ekoti dutiyādipaṭikkhepattho gaṇanaparicchedo. Puggaloti sammutikathā,
analyzed: eka puggalo ti ettha ekaḥ iti dutiya ādi paṭikkhepa atthaḥ gaṇana paricchedaḥ puggalo ti sammuti kathā

original: na paramatthakathā. Buddhassa hi bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā paramatthadesanā
analyzed: na paramattha kathā buddhassa hi bhagavataḥ duvidhā desanā sammuti desanā paramattha desanā

original: cāti. Ayamattho pana heṭṭhā vitthāritovāti idha na vuccati. Eko ca so puggalo cāti
analyzed: ca ati ayam attho pana heṭṭhā vitthāritaḥ uvā ti idha na vuccati ekaḥ ca so puggalo ca ati

original: ekapuggalo. Kenaṭṭhena ekapuggalo? Asadisaṭṭhena guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena asamasamaṭṭhena.
analyzed: eka puggalaḥ kena ṭṭhena eka puggalaḥ asadisa ṭṭhena guṇa visiṭṭha ṭṭhena asamasama ṭṭhena

original: So hi dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva
analyzed: saḥ hi dasannam pāramīnam paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanam ādim katvā bodhi sambhāra guṇehi ca iva

original: buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Ye cassa te
analyzed: buddha guṇehi ca sesa mahājanena asadisaḥ ti eka puggalaḥ ye ca ssa te

original: guṇā, tepi aññasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Purimakā
analyzed: guṇā te pi añña sattānam guṇehi visiṭṭhā ati guṇa visiṭṭha ṭṭhena pi eka puggalaḥ purimakā

original: sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva eko rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva nāmakāyaguṇehi
analyzed: sammāsambuddhāḥ sabba sattehi asamā tehi saddhim ayam eva ekaḥ rūpa kāya guṇehi ca iva nāma kāya guṇehi

original: ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Loketi sattaloke.
analyzed: ca samaḥ iti asama sama ṭṭhena pi eka puggalaḥ loke iti satta loke

original: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva. Uppajjanto bahujanahitatthāya
analyzed: uppajjamānaḥ uppajjati iti idam pana ubhayam pi vippakata vacanam eva uppajjantaḥ bahu jana hita tthāya

original: uppajjati, na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo. Evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati na aññena kāraṇena ati evam pana ittha atthaḥ veditabbo evarūpam ca ittha lakkhaṇam

original: na sakkā etaṃ aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ. Apica uppajjamāno nāma, uppajjati
analyzed: na sakkā etam aññena sadda lakkhaṇena paṭibāhitum apica uppajjamānaḥ nāma uppajjati

original: nāma, uppanno nāmāti ayamettha bhedo veditabbo. Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato laddhabyākaraṇo
analyzed: nāma uppannaḥ nāma ati ayam ettha bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ esa hi dīpaṅkara pāda mūlataḥ laddha byākaraṇaḥ

original: buddhakārakadhamme pariyesanto dasa pāramiyo disvā “ime dhammā mayā pūretabbā”ti
analyzed: buddha kāraka dhamme pariyesantaḥ dasa pāramiyaḥ disvā ime dhammā mayā pūretabbā ati

original: katasanniṭṭhāno dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Sīlapāramiṃ…pe… upekkhāpāraminti
analyzed: kata sanniṭṭhānaḥ dāna pāramim pūrentaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma sīla pāramim pe upekkhā pāramim ti

original: imā dasa pāramiyo pūrentopi, dasa upapāramiyo pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Dasa paramatthapāramiyo
analyzed: imāḥ dasa pāramiyaḥ pūrentaḥ api dasa upapāramiyaḥ pūrentaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma dasa paramattha pāramiyaḥ

original: pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
analyzed: pūrentaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma

original: Ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ pūrayamānopi uppajjamāno nāma.
analyzed: ñāta ttha cariyam loka ttha cariyam buddha ttha cariyam pūrayamānaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma

original: Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni buddhakārake dhamme matthakaṃ pāpentopi
analyzed: kappa sata sahassa adhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni buddha kārake dhamme matthakam pāpentaḥ pi

original: uppajjamāno nāma. Vessantarattabhāvaṃ pahāya tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikā
analyzed: uppajjamānaḥ nāma vessanta ratta bhāvam pahāya tusitapure paṭisandhim gahetvā saṭṭhi vassa sata sahassa adhikā

original: sattapaṇṇāsa vassakoṭiyo tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Devatāhi yācito pañca mahāvilokanāni
analyzed: satta paṇṇāsa vassa koṭiyaḥ tiṭṭhantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma devatāhi yācito pañca mahā vilokanāni

original: viloketvā māyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi, anūnādhike dasa māse gabbhavāsaṃ
analyzed: viloketvā māyādeviyā kucchismim paṭisandhim gaṇhantaḥ api anūna adhike dasa māse gabbha vāsam

original: vasantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno
analyzed: vasantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāra majjhe tiṭṭhantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ

original: nāma. Kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo
analyzed: nāma kāmesu ādīnavam nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsam disvā rāhulabhaddassa jāta divase channa sahāyaḥ

original: kaṇḍakaṃ assavaramāruyha nikkhamantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Tīṇi rajjāni atikkamanto
analyzed: kaṇḍakam assavaram āruyha nikkhamantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma tīṇi rajjāni atikkamantaḥ

original: anomanaditīre pabbajantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ karontopi uppajjamāno
analyzed: anomanadi tīre pabbajantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma cha bassāni mahāpadhānam karontaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ

original: nāma. Paripākagate ñāṇe oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Sāyanhasamaye
analyzed: nāma paripāka gate ñāṇe oḷārikam āhāram āharantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ nāma sāyanha samaye

original: visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ
analyzed: visākhapuṇṇa māyam mahā bodhimaṇḍam āruyha māra balam vidhametvā paṭhama yāme pubbenivāsam

original: anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ parisodhetvā pacchimayāmasamanantare dvādasaṅgaṃ
analyzed: anussaritvā majjhima yāme dibba cakkhum parisodhetvā pacchima yāma samanantare dvādasaṅgam

original: paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi uppajjamāno
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppādam anuloma paṭilomataḥ sammasitvā sotāpatti maggam paṭivijjhantaḥ api uppajjamānaḥ

original: nāma. Sotāpattiphalakkhaṇepi sakadāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi anāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi uppajjamāno
analyzed: nāma sotāpatti pha lakkhaṇe pi sakadāgāmi pha lakkhaṇe pi anāgāmi pha lakkhaṇe pi uppajjamāno

original: nāma. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe pana uppajjati nāma. Arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma.
analyzed: nāma arahatta magga kkhaṇe pana uppajjati nāma arahatta phala kkhaṇe uppannaḥ nāma

original: Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti, saheva pana
analyzed: buddhānam hi sāvakānam viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividha ñāṇa ādīni uppajjanti saha iva pana

original: arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādi guṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti, tasmā nibbattasabbakiccattā
analyzed: arahatta maggena sakalaḥ api sabbaññuta ññāṇa ādi guṇa rāsi āgataḥ iva nāma hoti tasmā nibbatta sabba kicca ttā

original: arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma hoti. Imasmimpi sutte arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya
analyzed: arahatta phalakkhaṇe uppannaḥ nāma hoti imasmim pi sutte arahatta phalakkhaṇam yeva sandhāya

original: “uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
analyzed: uppajjati iti vuttam uppannaḥ hoti iti ayam ha ittha atthaḥ

original: Bahujanahitāyāti mahājanassa hitatthāya uppajjati. Bahujanasukhāyāti mahājanassa
analyzed: bahu jana hitāya ati mahā janassa hita atthāya uppajjati bahu jana sukhāya ati mahā janassa

original: sukhatthāya uppajjati. Lokānukampāyāti sattalokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca uppajjati.
analyzed: sukha atthāya uppajjati loka anukampāya ati satta lokassa anukampam paṭicca uppajjati

original: Katarasattalokassāti? Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā amatapānaṃ pivi, dhammaṃ
analyzed: katara satta lokassa ati yaḥ tathāgatassa dhamma desanam sutvā amata pānam dhammaṃ

original: paṭivijjhi, tassa. Bhagavatā hi mahābodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā
analyzed: tassa bhagavatā hi mahā bodhimaṇḍe satta satta aham vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā

original: isipatanaṃ āgamma “dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti dhammacakkappavattanasuttante
analyzed: isipatanam āgamma dve me bhikkhave antāḥ pabbajitena na sevitabbā ti dhammacakkappavattana suttante

original: desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno amatapānaṃ
analyzed: desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍañña ttherena saddhim aṭṭhārasa koṭi saṅkhāḥ brahmānaḥ amata pānam

original: piviṃsu, etassa sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno. Pañcamadivase anattalakkhaṇasuttantapariyosāne
analyzed: piviṃsu etassa satta lokassa anukampāya uppanno pañcama divase anattalakkhaṇa suttanta pariyosāne

original: pañcavaggiyattherā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno.
analyzed: pañcavaggiya therāḥ arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu etassa api satta lokassa anukampāya uppanno

original: Tato yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi, tato kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
analyzed: tatas yasa dāra kappa mukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi tatas kappāsikavana saṇḍe

original: tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye tayo magge ca phalāni ca sampāpesi, etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya
analyzed: tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye tayaḥ magge ca phalāni ca sampāpesi etassa api satta lokassa anukampāya

original: uppanno. Gayāsīse ādittapariyāyapariyosāne jaṭilasahassaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi,
analyzed: uppannaḥ gayāsīse āditta pariyāya pariyosāne jaṭila sahassam arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi

original: tato laṭṭhivane bimbisārappamukhā ekādasa nahutā brāhmaṇagahapatikā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
analyzed: tatas laṭṭhivane bimbisāra pamukhāḥ ekādasa nahutāḥ brāhmaṇa gahapatikā satthu dhamma desanam

original: sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, ekaṃ nahutaṃ saraṇesu patiṭṭhitaṃ. Tirokuṭṭaanumodanāvasāne
analyzed: sutvā sotāpatti phale patiṭṭhahiṃsu ekam nahutam saraṇesu patiṭṭhitam tirokuṭṭa anumodanā avasāne

original: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṃ pītaṃ. Sumanamālākārasamāgame caturāsītiyā,
analyzed: caturāsītiyā pāṇa sahassehi amata pānam pītam sumana mālākāra samāgame caturāsītiyā

original: dhanapālasamāgame dasahi pāṇasahassehi, khadiraṅgārajātakasamāgame caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi,
analyzed: dhanapāla samāgame dasahi pāṇa sahassehi khadiraṅgāra jātaka samāgame caturāsītiyā pāṇa sahassehi

original: jambukaājīvakasamāgame caturāsītiyāva, ānandaseṭṭhisamāgame caturāsītiyāva pāṇasahassehi
analyzed: jambuka ājīvaka samāgame ānanda seṭṭhi samāgame pāṇa sahassehi

original: amatapānaṃ pītaṃ. Pāsāṇakacetiye pārāyanasuttakathādivase cuddasa koṭiyo amatapānaṃ
analyzed: amata pānam pītam pāsāṇaka cetiye pārāyana sutta kathā divase cuddasa koṭiyaḥ amata pānam

original: piviṃsu. Yamakapāṭihāriyadivase vīsati pāṇakoṭiyo, tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ
analyzed: yamakapāṭihāriya divase vīsati

original: nisīditvā mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ desentassa asīti
analyzed: nisīditvā mātaram kāya sakkhim katvā satta ppakaraṇam abhidhammam desentassa asi iti

original: vā purimā. Te hi puggalappamāṇikā, pacchimā dhammānusārīgottānaṃ. Saddhācaritatāya

original: apekkhitvā tattha tattha duvidhaṃ desanaṃ desetīti veditabbaṃ.

analyzed: diṭṭhigatikānam sassata ādi vasena attā loko ti parikappanā yebhuyyena satta visayā

original: veditabbo”ti. Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti
analyzed: veditabbaḥ uti yāvatā candima sūriyā pariharanti iti yattake ṭhāne candima sūriyā parivattanti

original: Yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti
analyzed: yathā mahā samuddaḥ yāva cakkavāḷa pāda mūlā anupubba ninnaḥ evam yāva sineru pāda mūlā ati

original: heṭṭhā sineruppamāṇato upaḍḍhappamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito,
analyzed: heṭṭhā sineru ppamāṇataḥ upaḍḍha ppamāṇaḥ api yugandhara pabbataḥ pathaviyam su patiṭṭhitaḥ

original: evaṃ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno
analyzed: evam īsadhara ādayaḥ api iti daṭṭhabbam vuttam ha etam mahā samuddaḥ bhikkhave anupubba ninnaḥ

original: anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro”ti. Sineruyugandharādīnaṃ antare sīdantarasamuddā nāma
analyzed: anupubba poṇaḥ anupubba pabbhāraḥ iti sineru yugandhara ādīnam antare sīdantara samuddāḥ nāma

original: honti. Tattha kira udakaṃ sukhumaṃ morapattamattampi pakkhittaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti
analyzed: honti tattha kira udakam su khumam mora patta mattam pi pakkhittam patiṭṭhātum na sakkoti

original: sīdateva, tasmā te sīdasamuddā nāma vuccanti. Te pana vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ
analyzed: tasmā te sīdasamuddāḥ nāma vuccanti te pana vitthārataḥ yathākkamam

original: accuggamasamānapaamāṇāti vadanti. Ajjhogāḷhuggatāti ajjhogāḷhā ca uggatā ca. Brahāti mahantā.
analyzed: vadanti ajjhogāḷha uggatā ati ajjhogāḍhā ca uggatā ca mahantā

original: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā. Sineruṃ tāva
analyzed: sinerussa samantataḥ ti parikkhipana vasena sinerussa samantataḥ ṭhitā sinerum tāva

original: parikkhipitvā ṭhito yugandharo, taṃ parikkhipitvā īsadharo. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā
analyzed: parikkhipitvā ṭhitaḥ yugandharaḥ tam parikkhipitvā īsadharaḥ evam tam tam parikkhipitvā

original: ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā. Katthaci pana “sineruṃ parikkhipitvā assakaṇṇo
analyzed: ṭhitā sinerussa samantataḥ ti vuttā katthaci pana sinerum parikkhipitvā assa kaṇṇaḥ

original: nāma pabbato patiṭṭhito, taṃ parikkhipitvā vinatako nāma pabbato”ti evaṃ aññoyeva
analyzed: nāma pabbato patiṭṭhitaḥ tam parikkhipitvā vinatakaḥ nāma pabbataḥ ti evam aññaḥ yeva

original: anukkamo āgato. Tathā hi nimijātake –
analyzed: anukkamaḥ āgataḥ tathā hi nimi jātake

original: “Sahassayuttaṃ hayavāhiṃ, dibbayānamadhiṭṭhito;
analyzed: sahassa yuttam haya vāhim dibba yānam adhiṭṭhitaḥ

original: Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage;
analyzed: yāyamānaḥ mahā rājā addā sīdantare nage

original: Disvānāmantayī sūtaṃ, ime ke nāma pabbatā”ti.
analyzed: sūtam ime ke nāma pabbatā ti

original: Evaṃ nimimahārājena puṭṭhena mātalidevaputtena –
analyzed: evam nimi mahā rājena puṭṭhena mātali deva puttena

original: “Sudassano karavīko, īsadharo yugandharo;
analyzed: sudassanaḥ karavīkaḥ īsadharaḥ yugandharaḥ

original: Nemindharo vinatako, assakaṇṇo girī brahā.
analyzed: nemindharaḥ vinatakaḥ assakaṇṇaḥ girī brahā

original: “Ete sīdantare nagā, anupubbasamuggatā;
analyzed: ete sīdantare nagāḥ anupubba samuggatā

original: Mahārājānamāvāsā, yāni tvaṃ rāja passasī”ti.
analyzed: mahā rājānam āvāsā yāni tvam rāja passasi iti

original: Vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam

original: Tattha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
analyzed: tattha aṭṭhakathāyam idam vuttam

original: “Ayaṃ, mahārāja, etesaṃ sabbabāhiro sudassano pabbato nāma, tadanantare karavīko
analyzed: ayam mahā rāja etesam sabba bāhiraḥ sudassano pabbataḥ nāma tad anantare karavīkaḥ

original: nāma, so sudassanato uccataro. Ubhinnampi pana tesaṃ antare ekopi sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
analyzed: nāma so sudassanataḥ uccataraḥ ubhinnam pi pana tesam antare ekaḥ api sīdantara mahā samuddaḥ

original: Karavīkassa anantare īsadharo nāma, so karavīkato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
analyzed: karavīkassa anantare īsadharaḥ nāma saḥ karavīkato uccataraḥ tesam pi antare ekaḥ sīdantara mahā samuddo

original: Īsadharassa anantare yugandharo nāma, so īsadharato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko
analyzed: īsadharassa anantare yugandharaḥ nāma saḥ īsadharato uccataro tesam pi antare ekaḥ

original: sīdantaramahāsamuddo. Yugandharassa anantare nemindharo nāma, so yugandharato uccataro.
analyzed: sīdantara mahā samuddaḥ yugandharassa anantare nemindharaḥ nāma saḥ yugandharataḥ uccataraḥ

original: Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo. Nemindharassa anantare vinatako nāma, so
analyzed: tesam pi antare ekaḥ sīdantara mahā samuddaḥ nemindharassa anantare vinatakaḥ nāma so

original: nemindharato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo. Vinatakassa anantare
analyzed: nemindharataḥ uccataraḥ tesam pi antare ekaḥ sīdantara mahā samuddaḥ vinatakassa anantare

original: assakaṇṇo nāma, so vinatakato uccataro. Tesampi antare eko sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
analyzed: assakaṇṇaḥ nāma saḥ vinatakataḥ uccataraḥ tesam pi antare ekaḥ sīdantara mahā samuddaḥ

original: Ete sīdantaramahāsamudde satta pabbatā anupaṭipāṭiyā samuggatā sopānasadisā hutvā ṭhitā”ti.
analyzed: ete sīdantara mahā samudde satta pabbatāḥ anupaṭipāṭiyā samuggatā sopāna sadisā hutvā ṭhitā ati

original: Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanasatāni ucco,
analyzed: yojanānam satān uccaḥ himavā pañca pabbatā iti himavā pabbataḥ pañca yojana satāni uccaḥ

original: ubbedhoti attho. Tattha himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttatāya himaṃ assa atthīti
analyzed: ubbedhaḥ ti attho tattha himavanti hima pāta samaye hima yutta tāya himam assa atthi iti

original: himavā, gimhakāle himaṃ vamatīti himavā. Pabbatoti selo. Selo hi sandhisaṅkhātehi
analyzed: himavā gimha kāle himam vamati iti himavā pabbato ti selaḥ selaḥ hi sandhi saṅkhātehi

original: pabbehi sahitattā “pabbato”ti vuccati, pasavanādivasena jalassa sārabhūtānaṃ bhesajjādīnaṃ
analyzed: pabbehi sahita ttā pabbatoti vuccati pasavana ādi vasena jalassa sāra bhūtānam bhesajja ādīnam

original: vatthūnañca giraṇato “girī”ti ca vuccati. Yojanānaṃ sahassāni, tīṇi āyatavitthatoti
analyzed: vatthūnam ca giraṇataḥ girī iti ca vuccati yojanānam sahassāni tīṇi

original: yojanānaṃ tīṇi sahassāni āyāmato ca vitthārato cāti attho, āyāmato ca vitthārato
analyzed: yojanānam tīṇi sahassāni āyāmato ca vitthārato ca ati attho āyāmato ca vitthārato

original: ca tīṇi yojanasahassānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ca tīṇi yojana sahassāni iti vuttam hoti

original: Caturāsītisahassehi, kūṭehi paṭimaṇḍitoti sudassanakūṭacitrakūṭādīhi caturāsītikūṭasahassehi
analyzed: caturāsīti sahassehi kūṭehi paṭimaṇḍitaḥ ti sudassanakūṭa citrakūṭa ādīhi caturāsīti kūṭa sahassehi

original: paṭimaṇḍito, sobhitoti attho. Apicettha avuttopi ayaṃ viseso veditabbo – ayaṃ himavā
analyzed: paṭimaṇḍitaḥ sobhitaḥ ti attho api ca ittha avuttaḥ api ayam visesaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam himavā

original: nāma pabbato samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto, yattha āyāmavitthārena ceva
analyzed: nāma pabbataḥ samantataḥ sandamāna pañca sata nadī vicittaḥ yattha āyāma vitthārena ca iva

original: gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsa paṇṇāsa yojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā anotattadaho

original: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinīdaho sīhappapātadahoti
analyzed: kaṇṇamuṇḍa daho rathakāra daho chaddanta daho kuṇāla daho mandākinī daho sīha ppapāta daho ti

original: satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā. Tesu anotatto sudassanakūṭaṃ citrakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ
analyzed: satta mahā sarā patiṭṭhitā tesu anotattaḥ sudassanakūṭam citrakūṭam kāḷakūṭam gandhamādanakūṭam

original: kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto. Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ
analyzed: kelāsakūṭam ti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhittaḥ tattha sudassana kūṭam sovaṇṇa mayam

original: dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: dvi yojana satur bedham antar vaṅkam kāka mukha saṇṭhānam tam eva saram paṭicchādetvā ṭhitam

original: Citrakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ. Kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ. Gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare
analyzed: citrakūṭam sabbaratana mayam kāḷakūṭam añjana mayam gandhamādana kūṭam sānu mayam abbhantare

original: muggavaṇṇaṃ kāḷānusāriyādimūlagandho candanādisāragandho saralādipheggugandho lavaṅgāditacagandho
analyzed: mugga vaṇṇam kāḷānusāriya ādi mūla gandhaḥ candanādi sāra gandhaḥ saralādi pheggu gandhaḥ lavaṅga ādi taca gandhaḥ

original: kapiṭṭhādipapaṭikagandho sajjādirasagandho tamālādipattagandho nāgakuṅkumādipupphagandho
analyzed: kapiṭṭha ādi papaṭika gandho sajja ādi rasa gandho tamāla ādi patta gandhaḥ nāga kuṅkuma ādi puppha gandho

analyzed: jāti phala ādi phala gandho sabbathā gandha bhāvataḥ gandha gandho ti imehi dasahi gandhehi

original: ussannaṃ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ kāḷapakkhauposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: ussannam nānappakāra osadha sañchannam kāḷa pakkha uposatha divase ādittam iva aṅgāram jalantam tiṭṭhati

original: Tattheva nandamūlakaṃ nāma pabbhāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanokāso. Tisso guhāyo suvaṇṇaguhā
analyzed: tattha iva nandamūlakam nāma pabbhāram paccekabuddhānam vasanokāsaḥ tisso guhāyaḥ suvaṇṇaguhā

original: maṇiguhā rajataguhāti. Tattha maṇiguhādvāre mañjūsako nāma rukkho yojanaṃ ubbedhena,
analyzed: maṇiguhā rajataguhā ti tattha maṇiguhā dvāre mañjūsakaḥ nāma rukkho yojanam ubbedhena

original: yojanaṃ vitthārena, so yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni pupphati visesena

original: paccekabuddhāgamanadivase, tassūparito sabbaratanamāḷo hoti. Tattha sammajjanakavāto
analyzed: paccekabuddha āgamana divase tassu uparitas sabba ratana māḷaḥ hoti tattha sammajjanaka vāto

original: kacavaraṃ chaḍḍeti, samakaraṇavāto sabbaratanamayaṃ vālikaṃ samaṃ karoti, siñcanakavāto

original: anotattadahato ānetvā udakaṃ siñcati, sugandhakaraṇavāto sabbesaṃ gandharukkhānaṃ

analyzed: gandhe āneti ocinaka vātaḥ pupphāni ocinitvā pāteti santharaṇaka vātaḥ sabbattha santharati

original: sadā paññattāneva cettha āsanāni honti. Yesu paccekabuddhuppādadivase uposathadivase
analyzed: sadā ca ittha āsanāni honti yesu paccekabuddha uppāda divase uposatha divase

original: ca sabbapaccekabuddhā sannipatitvā nisīdanti, ayaṃ tattha pakati. Abhisambuddhapaccekabuddho
analyzed: ca sabba paccekabuddhā sannipatitvā nisīdanti ayam tattha pakati abhisambuddha paccekabuddhaḥ

original: tattha gantvā paññattāsane nisīdati. Tato sace tasmiṃ kāle aññepi paccekabuddhā saṃvijjanti,
analyzed: tattha gantvā paññatta āsane nisīdati tatas sace tasmin kāle aññe api paccekabuddhā saṃvijjanti

original: tepi taṅkhaṇaṃ sannipatitvā paññattāsanesu nisīdanti, nisīditvā kiñcideva samāpattiṃ

original: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahanti. Tato saṅghatthero adhunāgataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ anumodanatthāya
analyzed: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahanti tatas saṅgha ttheraḥ adhunāgatam paccekabuddham sabbesam anumodana tthāya

original: “kathamadhigata”nti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati, tadā so attano udānabyākaraṇagāthaṃ bhāsati.
analyzed: katham adhigata nti kammaṭṭhānam pucchati tadā saḥ attanaḥ udāna byākaraṇa gātham bhāsati

original: Evamidaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ āvāsaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam idam gandhamādanakūṭam paccekabuddhānam āvāsa ṭṭhānam hoti iti veditabbam

original: Kelāsakūṭaṃ pana rajatamayaṃ. Sabbāni cetāni citrakūṭādīni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni
analyzed: kelāsakūṭam pana rajata mayam sabbāni cetāni citrakūṭa ādīni sudassanena samānubbedha saṇṭhānāni

original: tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. Sabbāni pana puthulato paññāsayojanāni, āyāmato

original: pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevāti vadanti. Tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena

original: ca ṭhassanti, nadiyo ca tesu sandanti, taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ anotattameva pavisati,
analyzed: ca nadiyaḥ ca tesu sandanti tam sabbam pi udakam anotattam eva pavisati

original: candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
analyzed: candima sūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbata antarena tattha obhāsam karonti

original: ujuṃ gacchantā na karonti, tenevassa “anotatta”nti saṅkhā udapādi. Tattha ratanamayamanuññasopānasilātalāni
analyzed: ujum gacchantā na karonti tena iva assa saṅkhā udapādi tattha ratana maya manuñña sopāna silā talāni

original: nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisanimmalūdakāni nhānatitthāni tadupabhogīsattānaṃ

original: sādhāraṇakammunāva suppaṭiyattāni susaṇṭhitāni honti, yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā
analyzed: suppaṭiyattāni su saṇṭhitāni honti yesu buddha paccekabuddha khīṇa āsavā

original: ca iddhimanto ca isayo nhāyanti, devayakkhādayo uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷanti.
analyzed: ca iddhimanto ca isayaḥ nhāyanti deva yakkha ādayaḥ uyyāna kīḷam kīḷanti

original: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ hatthimukhaṃ assamukhaṃ usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni
analyzed: tassa catūsu passesu sīha mukham hatthi mukham assa mukham usabha mukhanti cattāri mukhāni

original: honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. Sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā
analyzed: honti yehi catasso nadiyaḥ sandanti sīha mukhena nikkhanta nadī tīre sīhāḥ bahutarā

original: honti, hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ
analyzed: honti hatthi mukha ādīhi hatthi assa usabhā puratthima disataḥ nikkhanta nadī anotattam

original: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ
analyzed: tikkhattum padakkhiṇam katvā itarāḥ tissaḥ nadiyaḥ an upagamma pācīna himavantena iva amanussa patham

original: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi
analyzed: gantvā mahā samuddam pavisati pacchima disatas ca uttara disatas ca nikkhanta nadiyo pi

original: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ
analyzed: tathā iva padakkhiṇam katvā pacchima himavantena iva uttara himavantena iva ca amanussa patham

original: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ

original: tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā

original: Tathā hesa ekasmiṃ māse kadāci dakkhiṇato, kadāci uttarato dissati, candassa ubhosu
analyzed: tathā ha isaḥ ekasmin māse kadāci dakkhiṇatas kadāci uttaratas dissati candassa ubhosu

original: passesu nakkhattatārakā gacchanti, cando dhenu viya vacchaṃ taṃ taṃ nakkhattaṃ upasaṅkamati,
analyzed: passesu nakkhatta tārakāḥ gacchanti candaḥ dhenu viya vaccham tam tam nakkhattam upasaṅkamati

original: nakkhattāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahanti, attano vīthiyāva gacchanti. Sūriyassa
analyzed: nakkhattāni pana attanaḥ gamana ṭṭhānam na vijahanti attanaḥ vīthiyā ava gacchanti sūriyassa

original: pana ujukaṃ gamanaṃ sīghaṃ, tiriyaṃ gamanaṃ dandhaṃ. Tiriyaṃ gamanaṃ nāma dakkhiṇadisato
analyzed: pana ujukam gamanam sīgham tiriyam gamanam dandham tiriyam gamanam nāma dakkhiṇa disataḥ

original: uttaradisāya, uttaradisato dakkhiṇadisāya gamanaṃ, taṃ dandhaṃ chahi chahi māsehi ijjhanato.
analyzed: uttara disāya uttara disatas dakkhiṇa disāya gamanam tam dandham chahi chahi māsehi

original: Sūriyo kāḷapakkhauposathe candena saheva gantvā tato paraṃ pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ
analyzed: sūriyaḥ kāḷapakkha uposathe candena saha iva gantvā tatas param pāṭipada divase

original: satasahassaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati attano sīghagāmitāya tassa ca dandhagāmitāya,
analyzed: sata sahassam canda maṇḍalam ohāya gacchati attano sīgha gāmitāya tassa ca dandha gāmitāya

original: atha cando lekhā viya paññāyati. Tato parampi pakkhassa dutiyāya yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ
analyzed: atha candaḥ lekhā viya paññāyati tato param pi pakkhassa dutiyāya yojanānam sata sahassam

original: candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati. Evaṃ divase divase yāva sukkapakkhauposathadivasā satasahassaṃ
analyzed: canda maṇḍalam ohāya gacchati evam divase divase yāva sukka pakkha uposatha divasā sata sahassam

original: satasahassaṃ ohāya gacchati, atha cando anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā uposathadivase paripuṇṇo
analyzed: sata sahassam ohāya gacchati atha candaḥ anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā uposatha divase paripuṇṇaḥ

original: hoti. Anukkamena vaḍḍhanañcettha uparibhāgato patitasūriyālokatāya heṭṭhato pavattāya
analyzed: hoti anukkamena vaḍḍhanam ca ittha upari bhāgataḥ patita sūriya āloka tāya heṭṭhatas pavattāya

original: sūriyassa dūrabhāvena divase divase anukkamena parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena
analyzed: sūriyassa dūra bhāvena divase divase anukkamena parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena

original: anukkamena caṇḍamaṇḍalappadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa viya dissamānatāyāti veditabbaṃ,
analyzed: anukkamena caṇḍa maṇḍala ppadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa viya dissamāna tāya ati veditabbam

original: tasmā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā viya uposathadivase puṇṇamāyaṃ paripuṇṇamaṇḍalo hutvā
analyzed: tasmai anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā viyas uposatha divase puṇṇamāyam paripuṇṇa maṇḍalaḥ hutvā

original: dissati. Atha sūriyo pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā puna candamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: dissati atha sūriyaḥ pāṭipada divase yoja nānam sata sahassam dhāvitvā puna canda maṇḍalam

original: gaṇhāti candassa dandhagatitāya attano ca sīghagatitāya, tathā dutiyāya satasahassanti
analyzed: gaṇhāti candassa dandha gati tāya attano ca sīgha gati tāya tathā dutiyāya

original: evaṃ yāva uposathadivasā satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā gaṇhāti. Atha cando anukkamena
analyzed: evam yāvaḥ uposatha divasā sata sahassam sata sahassam dhāvitvā gaṇhāti atha candaḥ anukkamena

original: hāyitvā kāḷapakkhauposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati, anukkamena hāyamānatā cettha
analyzed: hāyitvā kāḷapakkha auposatha divase sabbasas na paññāyati anukkamena hāyamāna tā ca ittha

original: anukkamena vaḍḍhamānatāya vuttanayena veditabbā. Tattha pana chāyāya hāyamānatāya
analyzed: anukkamena vaḍḍhamāna tāya vutta nayena veditabbā tattha pana chāyāya hāyamāna tāya

original: maṇḍalaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ viya dissati, idha ca chāyāya vaḍḍhamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ hāyamānaṃ
analyzed: maṇḍalam vaḍḍhamānam viya dissati idha ca chāyāya vaḍḍhamāna tāya maṇḍalam hāyamānam

original: viya dissati, tasmā anukkamena hāyitvā viya uposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati.
analyzed: viya dissati tasmai anukkamena hāyitvā viya uposatha divase sabbasas na paññāyati

original: Candaṃ heṭṭhā katvā sūriyo upari hoti, mahatiyā pātiyā khuddakabhājanaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: candam heṭṭhā katvā sūriyaḥ upari hoti mahatiyā pātiyā khuddaka bhājanam viya canda maṇḍalam

original: pidhīyati, majjhanhike gehacchāyā viya candassa chāyā na paññāyati. So chāyāya apaññāyamānāya
analyzed: pidhīyati majjhanhike geha chāyā viya candassa chāyā na paññāyati so chāyāya a paññāyamānāya

original: dūre ṭhitānaṃ divā padīpo viya sayampi na paññāyati.
analyzed: dūre ṭhitānam divā padīpaḥ viya sayam pi na paññāyati

original: Imesaṃ pana ajavīthi nāgavīthi govīthīti tisso gamanavīthiyo honti. Tattha ajānaṃ
analyzed: imesam pana aja vīthi nāga vīthi go vīthi iti tissaḥ gamana vīthiyaḥ honti tattha ajānam

original: udakaṃ paṭikūlaṃ hoti, hatthināgānaṃ manāpaṃ, gunnaṃ sītuṇhasamatāya phāsu hoti.
analyzed: udakam paṭikūlam hoti hatthi nāgānam manāpam gunnam sītuṇha samatāya phāsu hoti

original: Tathā ca yāya vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā sūriyābhitāpasantattā
analyzed: tathā ca vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassa valāhaka deva puttā sūriya abhitāpa santattā

original: attano vimānato na nikkhamanti, kīḷāpasutā hutvā na vicaranti, tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ vimānataḥ na nikkhamanti kīḷā pasutāḥ hutvā na vicaranti tadā kira sūriya vimānam

original: pakatimaggato adho otaritvā vicarati, tassa oruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi adho
analyzed: pakati maggataḥ adhas otaritvā vicarati tassa oruyha caraṇena iva canda vimānam pi adhas

original: oruyha carati taggatikattā, tasmā sā vīthi udakābhāvena ajānurūpatāya “ajavīthī”ti
analyzed: āruyha carati taggatikattā tasmā sā vīthi udaka abhāvena aja anurūpa tāya ajavīthī iti

original: samaññā gatā. Yāya pana vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā sūriyābhitāpābhāvato
analyzed: samaññā gatā yāya pana vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassa valāhaka devaputtā sūriya abhitāpa abhāvato

original: abhiṇhaṃ attano vimānato bahi nikkhamitvā kīḷāpasutā hutvā ito cito ca vicaranti,
analyzed: abhiṇham attanaḥ vimānataḥ bahi nikkhamitvā kīḷā pasutāḥ hutvā itas citas ca vicaranti

original: tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ pakatimaggato uddhaṃ āruhitvā vicarati, tassa uddhaṃ āruyha
analyzed: tadā kira sūriya vimānam pakati maggataḥ uddham āruhitvā vicarati tassa uddham āruyha

original: caraṇeneva candavimānampi uddhaṃ āruyha carati taggatikattā, taggatikatā ca samānagati
analyzed: caraṇena iva canda vimānam pi āruyha carati taggatika ttā taggatika tā ca samāna gati

original: nāma vātamaṇḍalena vimānassa phellitabbattā, tasmā sā vīthi udakabahubhāvena nāgānurūpatāya
analyzed: nāma vāta maṇḍalena vimānassa phellitabba ttā tasmā sā vīthi udaka bahu bhāvena nāga anurūpa tāya

original: “nāgavīthī”ti samaññā gatā. Yadā sūriyo uddhaṃ anārohanto adho ca anotaranto pakatimaggeneva
analyzed: nāgavīthī iti samaññā gatā yadā sūriyaḥ uddham an ārohantaḥ adho ca pakati maggena iva

original: gacchati, tadā vassavalāhakā yathākālaṃ yathāruciñca vimānato nikkhamitvā sukhena
analyzed: gacchati tadā vassa valāhakāḥ yathākālam yathārucin ca vimānataḥ nikkhamitvā sukhena

original: vicaranti, tena kālena kālaṃ vassanato loke utusamatā hoti, tāya utusamatāya hetubhūtāya
analyzed: vicaranti tena kālena kālam loke utu samatā hoti tāya utu samatāya hetu bhūtāya

original: sā candimasūriyānaṃ gati gavānurūpatāya “govīthī”ti samaññā gatā. Tasmā yaṃ kālaṃ
analyzed: sā candima sūriyānam gati gavā anurūpa tāya go vīthī iti samaññā gatā tasmai yam kālam

original: candimasūriyā ajavīthiṃ āruhanti, tadā devo ekabindumpi na vassati. Yadā nāgavīthiṃ
analyzed: candima sūriyāḥ aja vīthim āruhanti tadā devaḥ eka bindum pi na vassati yadā nāga vīthim

original: ārohanti, tadā bhinnaṃ viya nabhaṃ paggharati. Yadā govīthiṃ ārohanti, tadā utusamatā sampajjati.
analyzed: ārohanti tadā bhinnam viya nabham paggharati yadā go vīthim ārohanti tadā utu sama tā sampajjati

original: Yadā pana rājāno adhammikā honti, tesaṃ adhammikatāya uparājasenāpatippabhutayo sabbe
analyzed: yadā pana rājānaḥ adhammikāḥ honti tesam adhammika tāya uparāja senāpati pabhutayaḥ sabbe

original: devā brahmāno ca adhammikā honti, tadā tesaṃ adhammikatāya visamaṃ candimasūriyā
analyzed: devāḥ brahmāno ca adhammikāḥ honti tadā tesam adhammika tāya visamam candima sūriyā

original: parivattanti. Tadā hi bahvābādhatādianiṭṭhaphalūpanissayabhūtassa yathāvuttassa adhammikatāsaññitassa
analyzed: parivattanti tadā hi bahu ābādha tā ādi aniṭṭha phala upanissaya bhūtassa yathā vuttassa adhammika tā saññitassa

original: sādhāraṇassa pāpakammassa balena visamaṃ vāyantena vāyunā phelliyamānā candimasūriyā
analyzed: sādhāraṇassa pāpa kammassa balena visamam vāyantena vāyunā phelliyamānā candima sūriyā

original: sineruṃ parikkhipantā visamaṃ parivattanti, yathāmaggena na pavattanti. Vāto yathāmaggena
analyzed: sinerum parikkhipantāḥ visamam parivattanti yathāmaggena na pavattanti vātaḥ yathāmaggena

original: na vāyati, ayathāmaggena vāyati, ayathāmaggena vāyanto ākāsaṭṭhavimānāni khobheti,
analyzed: na vāyati ayathāmaggena vāyati ayathāmaggena vāyantaḥ ākāsaṭṭhavimānāni khobheti

original: vimānesu khobhitesu devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni na namanti, cittesu anamantesu
analyzed: vimānesu khobhitesu devatānam kīḷana tthāya cittāni na namanti cittesu a namantesu

original: sītuṇhabhedo utu yathākālena na sampajjati, tasmiṃ asampajjante na sammā devo vassati,
analyzed: sītuṇha bhedaḥ utu yathākālena na sampajjati tasmin a sampajjante na sammā devaḥ vassati

original: kadāci vassati, kadāci na vassati, katthaci vassati, katthaci na vassati. Vassantopi
analyzed: kadāci vassati kadāci na vassati katthaci vassati katthaci na vassati vassantaḥ api

original: vappakāle aṅkurakāle nāḷakāle pupphakāle khīraggahaṇādikālesu yathā yathā sassānaṃ
analyzed: vappa kāle aṅkura kāle nāḷa kāle puppha kāle khīra ggahaṇa ādi kālesu yathā yathā sassānam

original: upakāro na hoti, tathā tathā vassati ca vigacchati ca. Tena sassāni visamapākāni
analyzed: upakāraḥ na hoti tathā tathā vassati ca vigacchati ca tena sassāni visama pākāni

original: honti vigatagandharasādisampadāni, ekabhājane pakkhittataṇḍulesupi ekasmiṃ padese
analyzed: honti vigata gandha rasa ādi sampadāni eka bhājane pakkhitta taṇḍulesu pi ekasmin padese

original: bhattaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ atikilinnaṃ, ekasmiṃ samapākaṃ. Taṃ paribhuttaṃ
analyzed: bhattam uttaṇḍulam hoti ekasmin ati kilinnam ekasmin sama pākam tam paribhuttam

original: kucchiyampi sabbaso apariṇataṃ, ekadesena pariṇataṃ, supariṇatanti evaṃ tīhiyeva
analyzed: kucchiyam pi sabbaso apariṇatam eka desena pariṇatam su pariṇatam ti evam

original: pakārehi paccati, pakkāsayaṃ na sammā upagacchati. Tena sattā bahvābādhā ceva honti appāyukā ca.
analyzed: pakārehi paccati pakkāsayam na sammā upagacchati tena sattāḥ bahu ābādhāḥ ca iva honti appāyukā ca

original: Dhammikānaṃ pana rājūnaṃ kāle vuttavipariyāyena candimasūriyā samaṃ parivattanti,
analyzed: dhammikānam pana rājūnam kāle vutta vipariyāyena candima sūriyā samam parivattanti

original: yathāmaggena pavattanti, utusamatā ca sampajjati, candimasūriyā cha māse sineruto
analyzed: yathāmaggena pavattanti utu sama tā ca sampajjati candima sūriyā cha māse

original: bahi nikkhamanti, cha māse anto vicaranti. Tathā hi sinerusamīpena taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: bahi nikkhamanti cha māse antar vicaranti tathā hi sineru samīpena tam padakkhiṇam

original: katvā gacchantā cha māse tato gamanavīthito bahi attano tiriyaṃ gamanena cakkavāḷābhimukhā
analyzed: katvā gacchantā cha māse tatas gamana vīthitaḥ bahi tiriyam gamanena cakkavāḷa abhimukhā

original: nikkhamanti. Evaṃ cha māse khaṇe khaṇe sineruto apasakkanavasena tato nikkhamitvā
analyzed: nikkhamanti evam cha māse khaṇe khaṇe sinerutaḥ apasakkana vasena tatas nikkhamitvā

original: cakkavāḷasamīpaṃ pattā. Tatopi cha māse khaṇe khaṇe apasakkanavasena nikkhamitvā
analyzed: cakkavāḷa samīpam pattā tatas api cha māse khaṇe khaṇe apasakkana vasena nikkhamitvā

original: sinerusamīpaṃ pāpuṇantā anto vicaranti. Te hi āsāḷhīmāse sinerusamīpena caranti,
analyzed: sineru samīpam pāpuṇantaḥ antar vicaranti te hi āsāḷhī māse sineru samīpena caranti

original: tato dve māse nikkhamitvā bahi caranti. Paṭhamakattikamāse majjhena gacchanti, tato
analyzed: tatas dve māse nikkhamitvā bahi caranti paṭhama kattika māse majjhena gacchanti tatas

original: cakkavāḷābhimukhā gantvā tayo māse cakkavāḷasamīpena vicaritvā puna nikkhamitvā citramāse
analyzed: cakkavāḷa abhimukhāḥ gantvā tayaḥ māse cakkavāḷa samīpena vicaritvā puna nikkhamitvā citra māse

original: majjhena gantvā tato pare dve māse sineruabhimukhā pakkhanditvā puna āsāḷhe sinerusamīpena
analyzed: majjhena gantvā tatas pare dve māse sineru abhimukhā pakkhanditvā punar āsāḷhe sineru samīpena

original: caranti. Ettha ca sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ, tassa sinerussa
analyzed: caranti ettha ca sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ca yam ṭhānam vemajjham tassa sinerussa

original: ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ, tena gacchantā sinerusamīpena carantīti veditabbā, na sinerussa
analyzed: ca yam ṭhānam vemajjham tena gacchantā sineru samīpena caranti iti veditabbā na sinerussa

original: aggālindaṃ allīnā, cakkavāḷasamīpena caraṇampi imināva nayena veditabbaṃ. Yadā pana
analyzed: aggālindam cakkavāḷa samīpena caraṇam pi iminā ava nayena veditabbam yadā pana

original: sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ujukaṃ vemajjhena gacchanti, tadā vemajjhena vicarantīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ujukam vemajjhena gacchanti tadā vemajjhena vicaranti iti veditabbam

original: Evaṃ vicarantā ca ekappahārena tīsupi dīpesu ālokaṃ karonti. Ekekāya disāya nava
analyzed: evam vicarantā ca eka pahārena tīsu pi dīpesu ālokam karonti ekekāya disāya nava

original: nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti. Kathaṃ? Imasmiñhi
analyzed: nava yojana sata sahassāni andhakāram vidhamitvā ālokam dassenti katham imasmin hi

original: dīpe sūriyuggamanakālo pubbavidehe majjhanhiko hoti, uttarakurūsu atthaṅgamanakālo,
analyzed: dīpe sūri yuj gamana kālaḥ pubbavidehe majjhanhikaḥ hoti uttarakurūsu atthaṅgamana kālaḥ

original: aparagoyāne majjhimayāmo, pubbavidehamhi uggamanakālo uttarakurūsu majjhanhiko, aparagoyāne
analyzed: aparagoyāne majjhima yāmaḥ pubbavidehamhi uggamana kālaḥ uttarakurūsu majjhanhikaḥ aparagoyāne

original: atthaṅgamanakālo, idha majjhimayāmo, uttarakurūsu uggamanakālo aparagoyāne majjhanhiko,
analyzed: atthaṅgamana kālaḥ idha majjhima yāmaḥ uttarakurūsu uggamana kālaḥ aparagoyāne majjhanhikaḥ

original: idha atthaṅgamanakālo, pubbavidehe majjhimayāmo, aparagoyānadīpe uggamanakālo idha
analyzed: idha atthaṅgamana kālo pubbavidehe majjhima yāmaḥ apara goyāna dīpe uggamana kālo idha

original: majjhanhiko, pubbavidehadīpe atthaṅgamanakālo, uttarakurūsu majjhimayāmo. Imasmiñhi
analyzed: majjhanhikaḥ pubbavideha dīpe atthaṅgamana kālaḥ uttarakurūsu majjhima yāmaḥ imasmin hi

original: dīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: dīpe ṭhitam ajjhanhika velāyam pubbavideha vāsīnam atthaṅgamana vasena upaḍḍham sūriya maṇḍalam

original: paññāyati, aparagoyānavāsīnaṃ uggamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ paññāyati. Evaṃ sesadīpesupi.
analyzed: paññāyati apara go yāna vāsīnam uggamana vasena upaḍḍham paññāyati evam sesa dīpesu pi

original: Iti imināva pakārena tīsu dīpesu ekappahāreneva candimasūriyā ālokaṃ dassentīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: iti iminā ava pakārena tīsu dīpesu eka ppahārena iva candima sūriyāḥ ālokam dassenti iti veditabbam

original: Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahāreneva ālokaṃ dassenti. Yasmiñhi dīpe atthaṅgamanavasena
analyzed: itas aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu eka ppahārena iva ālokam dassenti yasmin hi dīpe atthaṅgamana vasena

original: upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, atthaṅgamite tattha na paññāyati, ālokaṃ na dasseti,
analyzed: upaḍḍham sūriya maṇḍalam paññāyati atthaṅgamite tattha na paññāyati ālokam na dasseti

original: dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahārena ubhayaṃ. Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni
analyzed: dvīsu eva dīpesu eka ppahārena ubhayam ekekāya disāya nava nava yojana sata sahassāni

original: andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiñhi dīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ
analyzed: andhakāra vidhamanam pi iminā ava nayena daṭṭhabbam imasmin hi dīpe ṭhitam ajjhanhika velāyam

original: pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyatīti pubbavidehe

analyzed: uggate sūriye sabbattha andhakāra vidhamanato

analyzed: pātubhavantā ca candima sūriyā ekatas uva loke pātubhavanti tesu sūriyo paṭhamataraṃ

analyzed: te bhīta tasitāḥ bhaddakam vatassa sace aññaḥ ālokaḥ bhaveyya ati cintayiṃsu tatas mahājanassa

original: Tasmiṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgamite puna andhakāro ahosi. Te bhītatasitā “bhaddakaṃ

original: vatassa, sace añño āloko uppajjeyyā”ti cintayiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya

original: sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā cattāro ca dīpā pātubhavanti, te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ

original: phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavantīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pātubhavanti iti veditabbam

analyzed: yasmai ca ittha ekam cakkavāḷam āyāmataḥ ca vitthārataḥ ca dvādasa sata sahassāni

analyzed: tīṇi sahassāni cattāri satāni paññāsañca yojanāni iti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam tasmā

analyzed: vutta ppamāṇataḥ imassa cakkavāḷassa sineḥ upatiṭṭhita ukāse caturāsīti yojana sahassāni

original: parato yāva cakkavāḷapabbatā uttaradisābhāgappamāṇañca pahāya imissā dakkhiṇadisāya –
analyzed: paratas yāva cakkavāḷa pabbatāḥ uttara disā bhāga ppamāṇañca pahāya imissā dakkhiṇa disāya

original: Sinerucakkavāḷānaṃ, antaraṃ parimāṇato;
analyzed: antaram parimāṇataḥ

original: Pañca satasahassāni, sahassānūnasaṭṭhi ca.
analyzed: pañca sata sahassāni ca

original: Satāni satta ñeyyāni, pañcavīsuttarāni ca;
analyzed: satāni satta ñeyyāni pañcavīsuttarāni ca

original: Majjhavīthigato nāma, tattha vemajjhago ravi.
analyzed: majjhavīthigataḥ nāma tattha vemajjhagaḥ

original: Majjhato yāva merumhā, cakkavāḷānamantare;
analyzed: majjhataḥ yāva merumhā cakkavāḷānam antare

original: Vemajjhago yadā hoti, ubhayantagato tadā.
analyzed: vemajjha gaḥ yadā hoti ubhaya anta gataḥ tadā

original: Majjhato yāva merumhā, cakkavāḷā ca pabbatā;
analyzed: majjhataḥ yāva merumhā cakkavāḷā ca pabbatā

original: Duve satasahassāni, sahassānūnasīti ca.
analyzed: duve sata sahassāni ca

original: Aṭṭhasataṃ duve saṭṭhi, yojanāni dvigāvutaṃ;
analyzed: aṭṭhasatam duve yojanāni dvigāvutam

original: Ubhato antato meru-cakkavāḷānamantare.
analyzed: ubhatas antatas meru cakka vāḷānam antare

original: Ekaṃ satasahassañca, sahassānūnatālīsaṃ;
analyzed: ekam sata sahassañca

original: Navasatānekatiṃsa, yojanāni ca gāvutaṃ.
analyzed: nava satā anekatiṃsa yojanāni ca gāvutam

original: Pamāṇato samantā ca, maṇḍalaṃ majjhavīthiyā;
analyzed: pamāṇataḥ ca maṇḍalam majjha vīthiyā

original: Satasahassānūnavīsa, sahassānekatiṃsa ca.
analyzed: ca

original: Satamekañca viññeyyaṃ, pañcasattati uttaraṃ;
analyzed: viññeyyam pañca sattati uttaram

original: Dakkhiṇaṃ uttarañcāpi, gacchanto pana bhāṇumā.
analyzed: dakkhiṇam uttaram ca api gacchantaḥ pana

original: Majjhavīthippamāṇena, maṇḍaleneva gacchati;
analyzed: majjha vīthi ppamāṇena maṇḍalena iva gacchati

original: Gacchanto ca panevaṃ so, oruyhoruyha heṭṭhato.
analyzed: ca pana ivam saḥ oruyha uruyha heṭṭhataḥ

original: Āruyhāruyha uddhañca, yato gacchati sabbadā;
analyzed: āruyha āruyhaḥ uddhan ca yatas gacchati sabbadā

original: Tato gativasenassa, dūramaddhānamāsi taṃ.
analyzed: tatas gati vasena assa dūram addhānam āsi tam

original: Tiṃsa satasahassāni, yojanāni pamāṇato;
analyzed: tiṃsa sata sahassāni yojanāni pamāṇataḥ

original: Tasmā so parito yāti, tattakaṃva dine dine.
analyzed: saḥ paritas yāti dine dine

original: Sahassamekaṃ pañcasataṃ, catupaññāsayojanaṃ;
analyzed: sahassam ekam pañca satam catu paññāsa yojanam

original: Tigāvutaṃ terasūsabhaṃ, tettiṃsa ratanāni ca.
analyzed: tigāvutam terasūsabham tettiṃsa ratanāni ca

original: Aṭṭhaṅgulāni ca tiriyaṃ, gacchatekadine ravi;
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅgulāni ca gacchatā eka dine ravi

original: Chatālīsasahassāni, cha satāni tigāvutaṃ.
analyzed: chatālīsa sahassāni cha satāni tigāvutam

original: Yojanānaṃ titālīsaṃ, māsenekena gacchati;
analyzed: yojanānam titālīsam māsena ekena gacchati

original: Tenavutisahassāni, dvisataṃ sattasīti ca.
analyzed: tenavuti sahassāni dvisatam sattasīti ca

original: Gāvutāni duve cāpi, dvīhi māsehi gacchati;
analyzed: gāvutāni duve ca api dvīhi māsehi gacchati

original: Imāya gatiyā anta-vīthito vīthiantimaṃ.
analyzed: imāya anta vīthitaḥ

original: Gacchati chahi māsehi, timāsehi ca majjhimaṃ;
analyzed: gacchati chahi māsehi ti māsehi ca majjhimam

original: Sinerusantike anta-vīthito pana bhāṇumā;
analyzed: sineru santike anta vīthitaḥ pana

original: Āgacchanto dvimāsehi, assa dīpassa majjhago.
analyzed: āgacchantaḥ dvi māsehi assa dīpassa majjhago

original: Tasmā sīhaḷadīpassa, majjhato meruantaraṃ;
analyzed: tasmā sīhaḷadīpassa majjhatas meru antaram

original: Duve satasahassāni, dvisatenādhikāni tu.
analyzed: duve sata sahassāni dvi satena adhikāni tu

analyzed: tettiṃsan ca sahassāni aṭṭhārasa tigāvutam

original: Cakkavāḷantarañcassa, dīpasseva ca majjhato.
analyzed: cakkavāḷa antarañcassa dīpassa iva ca majjhataḥ

original: Tīṇi satasahassāni, sahassāni chavīsati;
analyzed: tīṇi sata sahassāni sahassāni chavīsati

original: Cha uttarāni pañceva, satānekañca gāvutanti.
analyzed: uttarāni pañca iva satān ekaṃ ca

original: Evamettha ayampi viseso veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha ayam pi visesaḥ veditabbo

original: Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ dasasahassayojananti ettha tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti
analyzed: tāvatiṃsa bhavanam dasa sahassa yojanam ti ettha tettiṃsa saha puñña kārino ettha nibbattā ti

analyzed: devā tesam bhavanam tāvatiṃsa bhavanam tathā hi maghena māṇavena saddhim macalagāmake

analyzed: kālam katvā tattha uppanne tettiṃsa deva putte upādāya assa deva lokassa ayam paṇṇatti

original: jātāti vadanti. Atha vā yasmā sesacakkavāḷesupi cha kāmāvacaradevalokā atthi. Vuttampi

original: tassa devalokassāti veditabbā. Dasasahassayojananti idaṃ pana sakkapuraṃ sandhāya

analyzed: vuttam iti veditabbam tathā hi tāvatiṃsa kāyikāḥ devāḥ atthi pabbata ṭṭhakāḥ atthi ākāsa ṭṭhakā

original: tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā, tathā cātumahārājikānaṃ yāmādīnañca. Ekadevalokepi

original: dvārasahassayuttaṃ ahosi ārāmapokkharaṇīpaṭimaṇḍitaṃ.

analyzed: tassa majjhe ti yojana satubbedhehi dhajehi paṭimaṇḍitaḥ satta ratana mayaḥ satta yojana satubbedhaḥ

analyzed: yaṭṭhīsu satta ratana mayāḥ dhajā

analyzed: ratha pañjaraḥ paṇṇāsa yojanaḥ ratha sandhitaḥ yāva ratha sīsā paṇṇāsā iva yojanāni tat eva

original: atthato tiṭṭhati. Tattha tiyojanikaṃ setacchattaṃ, ekasmiṃyeva yuge sahassaājaññayuttaṃ.

analyzed: vijahitvā diyaḍḍha yojana satikaḥ erāvaṇaḥ nāma hatthī hoti saḥ tettiṃsa kumbhe māpeti

analyzed: tiṃsa yojanikam kumbham māpeti tassa upari dvādasa yojanikaḥ ratana maṇḍapaḥ hoti tattha

original: antarantarā sattaratanamayā yojanubbedhā dhajā uṭṭhahanti. Pariyante kiṅkiṇikajālā

original: olambanti, yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasadiso dibbagītasaddo viya
analyzed: olambanti yassa manda vāta īritassa pañcaṅgika tūriya sadda sadisaḥ dibba gīta saddaḥ viya

original: ravo niccharati. Maṇḍapamajjhe sakkassa yojaniko maṇipallaṅko paññatto hoti, tattha
analyzed: ravaḥ niccharati maṇḍapa majjhe sakkassa yojanikaḥ maṇi pallaṅkaḥ paññattaḥ hoti tattha

original: sakko nisīdati. Tettiṃsāya kumbhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ kumbhe satta satta dante māpeti, tesu
analyzed: sakkaḥ nisīdati tettiṃsāya kumbhānam ekekasmin kumbhe satta satta dante māpeti tesu

original: ekeko paṇṇāsayojanāyāmo. Ekekasmiñcettha dante satta satta pokkharaṇiyo honti, ekekāya

original: ekekassa pupphassa satta satta pattāni, ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta devadhītaro naccanti.
analyzed: ekekassa pupphassa satta satta pattāni ekekasmin patte satta satta deva dhītaraḥ naccanti

original: Evaṃ samantā paṇṇāsayojanaṭṭhāne hatthidantesuyeva naccanaṭasamajjo hoti.

original: Nandā nāma pana pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanā. “Pañcasatayojanikā”tipi vadanti.

original: Cittalatāvanaṃ pana saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ. “Pañcayojanasatika”ntipi vadanti. Taṃ pana dibbarukkhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ,
analyzed: cittalatā vanam pana saṭṭhi yojanikam pañca yojana satikam ti pi vadanti tam pana dibba rukkha sahassa paṭimaṇḍitam

original: tathā nandanavanaṃ phārusakavanañca. Sakko panettha accharāsaṅghaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ
analyzed: tathā nandana vanam phārusaka vanam ca sakkaḥ pana ittha accharā saṅgha parivutaḥ saṭṭhi yojanikam

analyzed: suvaṇṇa mahā vīthim otaritvā nakkhattam kīḷantaḥ nandana vana ādīsu vicarati

original: Pāricchattako pana koviḷāro samantā tiyojanasataparimaṇḍalo pañcadasayojanapariṇāhakkhandho

original: yojanasatubbedho. Tassa mūle saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paññāsayojanavitthārā pañcadasayojanubbedhā
analyzed: tassa mūle saṭṭhi yojana āyāmā paññāsa yojana vitthārā pañcadasa yojana ubbedhā

original: vā dukkhassa vā antaraṃ natthi, tasmā so “avīcī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato. Tassa hi puratthimabhittito
analyzed: vā dukkhassa vā antaram natthi tasmā so avīci iti saṅkhyam gataḥ tassa hi puratthima bhittitaḥ

original: jālā uṭṭhahitvā saṃsibbamānayojanasataṃ gantvā bhittiṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ
analyzed: jālā uṭṭhahitvā saṃsibbamāna yojana satam gantvā bhittim vinivijjhitvā paratas yojana satam

original: gacchati. Sesadisāsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ jālānaṃ nirantaratāya avīci. Abbhantare panassa
analyzed: gacchati esa iva nayaḥ evam jālānam nirantara tāya avīci abbhantare panassa

original: yojanasatike ṭhāne nāḷiyaṃ koṭṭetvā pūritatipupiṭṭhaṃ viya sattā nirantarā, “imasmiṃ
