original: ṭhāne satto atthi, imasmiṃ ṭhāne natthī”ti na vattabbaṃ, gacchantānaṃ ṭhitānaṃ nisinnānaṃ

original: nipannānañca paccamānānaṃ anto natthi, gacchantā ṭhite vā nisinne vā nipanne vā na
analyzed: nipannānam ca paccamānānam antaḥ natthi gacchantā ṭhite vā nisinne vā nipanne vā na

original: bādhenti. Evaṃ sattānaṃ nirantaratāya avīci. Kāyadvāre pana cha upekkhāsahagatāni
analyzed: bādhenti evam sattānam nirantara tāya avīci kāya dvāre pana cha upekkhā sahagatāni

original: cittāni uppajjanti, ekaṃ dukkhasahagataṃ. Evaṃ santepi yathā jivhāgge cha madhubindūni
analyzed: cittāni uppajjanti ekam dukkha sahagatam evam sante pi yathā jivhā agge cha madhu bindūni

original: ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ tambalohabindumhi ṭhapite anudahanabalavatāya tadeva paññāyati,
analyzed: ṭhapetvā ekasmin tamba loha bindumhi ṭhapite anudahana balavatāya tat eva paññāyati

analyzed: itarāni abbohārikāni honti evam anudahana balavatāya dukkham eva itthā nirantaram itarāni

analyzed: abbohārikāni iti evam dukkhassa nirantara tāya avīci iti vuccati ayam ca avīci mahānirayo

original: jambudīpassa heṭṭhā patiṭṭhito”ti vadanti.
analyzed: jambudīpassa heṭṭhā patiṭṭhito ti vadanti

original: Jambudīpo pana āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo. Tattha ca catusahassayojanappamāṇo

original: padeso tadupabhogīsattānaṃ puññakkhayā udakena ajjhotthaṭo “samuddo”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
analyzed: padesaḥ tad upabhogī sattānam puñña kkhayā udakena ajjhotthaṭaḥ samuddaḥ iti saṅkhyam gataḥ

original: Tisahassayojanappamāṇe manussā vasanti, tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhitoti veditabbo.

original: Aparagoyānaṃ sattasahassayojanantiādīsu āyāmato ca vitthārato ca pamāṇaṃ dassitanti

original: uppannāni, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ. Tāni pana sampiṇḍetvā satasahassaṃ, tato
analyzed: uppannāni tathā dutiyam tathā tatiyam tāni pana sampiṇḍetvā sata sahassam tatas

original: mukhampi taṃtaṃsaṇṭhāna”nti vadanti.

original: Api cettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo. Tattha kira

original: Sarīrampi tesaṃ atidīghatādidosarahitaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ jarāya anabhibhūtattā

analyzed: atthi yathā nāma ittha gimhānam pacchime māse paccūsavelāyam utu hoti

original: eke. “Brahmadevatāhi uyyojitā”ti apare. Tesaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā

original: ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā
analyzed: ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvega jātā aññam aññam mudu cittā hutvā mettā ādīni puññāni karitvā

original: devaloke nibbattanti. Tattha dibbasudhābhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tato vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ
analyzed: deva loke nibbattanti tattha dibba sudhā bhojanam bhuñjitvā tatas vāyokasiṇe parikammam

original: katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti. Devānaṃ kira sukhasamphassavātaggahaṇapaacayena vāyokasiṇe
analyzed: katvā jhānam paṭilabhanti devānam kira sukha samphassa vāta ggahaṇa paacayena vāyo kasiṇe

original: jhānāni sukheneva ijjhanti. Tadaññe pana āpāyikā sattā aparāpariyavedanīyena kammena
analyzed: jhānāni sukhena iva ijjhanti tad aññe pana āpāyikā sattā apara apariya vedanīyena kammena

original: devaloke nibbattanti. Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahito hi saṃsāre saṃsaranto nāma satto
analyzed: deva loke nibbattanti apara apariya vedanīya kamma rahitaḥ hi saṃsāre saṃsarantaḥ nāma satto

original: natthi. Tepi tattha tatheva jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti. Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena
analyzed: natthi te pi tattha tathā iva jhānam paṭilabhanti evam deva loke paṭiladdha jhāna vasena

original: sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti. Idañca yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sabbe api brahma loke nibbattanti idam ca yebhuyya vasena vuttam

original: Keci pana “apāyasattā saṃvaṭṭamānalokadhātūhi aññesu lokadhātūsupi nibbattanti. Na
analyzed: keci pana apāya sattā saṃvaṭṭamāna lokadhātūhi aññesu lokadhātūsu pi nibbattanti na

original: hi sabbe apāyasattā tadā rūpārūpabhavesu uppajjantīti sakkā viññātuṃ apāyesu dīghāyukānaṃ
analyzed: hi sabbe apāya sattā tadā rūpa arūpa bhavesu uppajjanti iti sakkā viññātum apāyesu dīgha āyukānam

original: devalokūpapattiyā asambhavato. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko pana vinassamānepi kappe nirayato
analyzed: deva loka upapattiyāḥ asambhavataḥ niyatam icchādiṭṭhiko pana vinassamāne pi kappe nirayato

original: na muccatiyeva, tasmā so tattha anibbattitvā piṭṭhicakkavāḷe nibbattati. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā
analyzed: na muccatiyā iva tasmā saḥ tattha a nibbattitvā piṭṭhi cakkavāḷe nibbattati niyatam icchā diṭṭhiyā

original: hi samannāgatassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. Tāya hi samannāgatassa neva saggo
analyzed: hi samannāgatassa bhavataḥ vuṭṭhānam nāma natthi tāya hi samannāgatassa na iva saggo

original: atthi, na maggo, tasmā so saṃvaṭṭamānacakkavāḷato aññattha niraye nibbattitvā paccati.
analyzed: atthi na maggo tasmā so saṃvaṭṭamāna cakkavāḷataḥ aññattha niraye nibbattitvā paccati

original: Kiṃ pana piṭṭhicakkavāḷaṃ na jhāyatīti? Jhāyati. Tasmiṃ jhāyamānepi esa ākāse ekasmiṃ
analyzed: kim pana piṭṭhi cakkavāḷam na jhāyati iti jhāyati tasmin jhāyamāne pi ākāse ekasmin

original: padese paccatī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: padese paccati iti vadanti

original: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati,
analyzed: vassu upacchedataḥ pana uddham dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena dutiyaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati

original: pātubhūte pana tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo, na divāparicchedo paññāyati. Eko sūriyo
analyzed: pātubhūte pana tasmin na iva ratti paricchedaḥ na divā paricchedaḥ paññāyati ekaḥ sūriyo

original: uṭṭheti, eko atthaṃ gacchati, avicchinnasūriyasantāpova loko hoti. Yathā ca kappavuṭṭhānakālato
analyzed: uṭṭheti ekaḥ attham gacchati avicchinna sūriya santāpaḥ uva lokaḥ hoti yathā ca kappa vuṭṭhāna kālato

original: pubbe uppannasūriyavimāne sūriyadevaputto hoti, evaṃ kappavināsakasūriye natthi.
analyzed: pubbe uppanna sūriya vimāne sūriyadeva putto hoti evam kappa vināsaka sūriye natthi

original: Kappavuṭṭhānakāle pana yathā aññe kāmāvacaradevā, evaṃ sūriyadevaputtopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā
analyzed: kappa vuṭṭhāna kāle pana yathā aññe kāmāvacara devāḥ evam sūriyadeva puttaḥ api jhānam nibbattetvā

original: brahmalokaṃ upapajjati. Sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pana pabhassaratarañceva tejavantatarañca
analyzed: brahma lokam upapajjati sūriya maṇḍalam pana pabhassarataram ca iva tejavantataram ca

original: hutvā pavattati. Taṃ antaradhāyitvā aññameva uppajjatīti apare. Tattha pakatisūriye
analyzed: hutvā pavattati tam antaradhāyitvā aññam eva uppajjati iti apare tattha pakati sūriye

original: vattamāne ākāse valāhakāpi dhūmasikhāpi vattanti, kappavināsakasūriye vattamāne vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ
analyzed: vattamāne ākāse valāhakā api dhūma sikhā api vattanti kappa vināsaka sūriye vattamāne vigata dhūma valāhakam

original: ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ nabhaṃ hoti. Ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyo sesakunnadiādīsu udakaṃ sussati.
analyzed: ādāsa maṇḍalam viya nimmalam nabham hoti ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyaḥ sesa kunnadi ādīsu udakam sussati

original: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.
analyzed: tatas api dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena tatiyaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā mahā nadiyaḥ api sussanti

original: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā himavati
analyzed: tatas api dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena catutthaḥ sūriyo pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā himavati

original: mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā sīhappapātadaho mandākinīdaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho anotattadaho
analyzed: mahā nadīnam pabhavā sīha ppapāta dahaḥ mandākinī dahaḥ kaṇṇamuṇḍa dahaḥ rathakāra dahaḥ anotatta dahaḥ

original: chaddantadaho kuṇāladahoti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti.
analyzed: chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho ti ime satta mahā sarā sussanti

original: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: tatas api dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena pañcamaḥ sūriyaḥ pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahā samudde udakam na saṇṭhāti

original: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
analyzed: tatas api dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā sakala cakkavāḷam

original: ekadhūmaṃ hoti pariyādinnasinehaṃ dhūmena. Yāya hi āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu
analyzed: eka dhūmam hoti dhūmena hi āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu

original: ābandhattā sampiṇḍitā hutvā tiṭṭhati, sā chaṭṭhasūriyapātubhāvena parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: sampiṇḍitā hutvā tiṭṭhati sā chaṭṭha sūriya pātubhāvena parikkhayam gacchati

original: Yathā cidaṃ, evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānipi.
analyzed: yathā ca idam evam koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷāni pi

original: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
analyzed: tatas api dīghassa addhunaḥ accayena sattamaḥ sūriyo pātubhavati yassa pātubhāvā sakala cakkavāḷam

original: ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi, yojanasatikādibhedāni sinerukūṭāni
analyzed: eka jālam hoti saddhim koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷehi yojana satika ādi bhedāni sineru kūṭāni

original: palujjitvā ākāseyeva antaradhāyanti. Sā aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti.
analyzed: palujjitvā ākāseya iva antaradhāyanti sā aggi jālā uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti

original: Tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānamaṇivimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gaṇhāti. Etenevūpāyena
analyzed: kanaka vimāna ratana vimāna maṇi vimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṃsa bhavanam gaṇhāti etena iva upāyena

original: yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmiṃ gaṇhāti, tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare āhacca
analyzed: yāva paṭhamajjhāna bhūmim gaṇhāti brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare

original: tiṭṭhati. Sā yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na nibbāyati. Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā
analyzed: tiṭṭhati sā yāva aṇumattam pi saṅkhāra gatam atthi tāva na nibbāyati sabba saṅkhāra parikkhayā

original: pana sappitelajjhāpanaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyati. Heṭṭhāākāsena
analyzed: pana sappi tela jjhāpana aggisikhā viya chārikam pi an avasesetvā nibbāyati heṭṭhā ākāsena

original: saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro.
analyzed: ekaḥ hoti mahandhakāraḥ

original: Evaṃ ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite lokasannivāse lokassa saṇṭhānatthāya
analyzed: evam ekam asaṅkhyeyyam ekaṅgaṇam hutvā ṭhite loka sannivāse lokassa saṇṭhāna tthāya

original: devo vassituṃ ārabhati, āditova antaraṭṭhake himapāto viya hoti. Tato kaṇamattā taṇḍulamattā
analyzed: devaḥ vassitum ārabhati āditas va antaraṭṭhake hima pāto viya hoti tatas kaṇa mattā taṇḍula mattā

original: muggamāsabadaraāmalakaeḷālukakumbhaṇḍaalābumattā udakadhārā hutvā anukkamena usabhadveusabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanadviyojana…pe…
analyzed: mugga māsa badara āmalaka eḷāluka kumbhaṇḍa alābu mattāḥ udaka dhārāḥ hutvā anukkamena usabha dveusabha aḍḍhagāvutagāvuta aḍḍhayojana yojana dviyojana pe

original: yojanasatayojanasahassamattā hutvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷagabbhantaraṃ yāva avinaṭṭhabrahmalokā
analyzed: yojana sata yojana sahassa mattāḥ hutvā koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷa gabbhantaram yāva a vinaṭṭha brahma lokā

original: pūretvā antaradhāyati. Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti
analyzed: pūretvā antaradhāyati tam udakam heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vātaḥ samuṭṭhahitvā ghanam karoti

original: parivaṭumaṃ paduminīpatte udakabindusadisaṃ.
analyzed: parivaṭumam paduminī patte udaka bindu sadisam

original: Kathaṃ tāvamahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ ghanaṃ karotīti ce? Vivarasampadānato vātassāti. Tañhissa
analyzed: katham tāva mahantam udaka rāsim ghanam karoti iti ce vivara sampadānataḥ vātassa ati tat hissa

original: tahiṃ tahiṃ vivaraṃ deti. Taṃ evaṃ vātena sampiṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ
analyzed: tahim tahim vivaram deti tam evam vātena sampiṇḍiyamānam ghanam kariyamānam parikkhayamānam

original: anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati. Otiṇṇe otiṇṇe udake brahmalokaṭṭhāne brahmaloko, uparicatukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne
analyzed: anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati otiṇṇe otiṇṇe udake brahmaloka ṭṭhāne brahmalokaḥ upari catu kāmāvacara deva loka ṭṭhāne

original: ca devalokā pātubhavanti. Cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsabhavanāni pana pathavīsambandhatāya
analyzed: ca deva lokā pātubhavanti cātumahārājika tāvatiṃsa bhavanāni pana pathavī sambandha tāya

original: na tāva pātubhavanti. Purimapathaviṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇe pana balavavātā uppajjanti, te
analyzed: na tāva pātubhavanti purima patha viṭṭhānam otiṇṇe pana balava vātāḥ uppajjanti te

original: taṃ pihitadvāre dhammakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā rumbhanti. Madhurodakaṃ
analyzed: tam pihita dvāre dhamma karaṇe ṭhita odakam iva nirussāsam katvā rumbhanti madhura udakam

original: parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, udakapiṭṭhe uppalinīpattaṃ
analyzed: parikkhayam gacchamānam upari rasa pathavim samuṭṭhāpeti udaka piṭṭhe uppalinī pattam

original: viya pathavī saṇṭhāti. Sā vaṇṇasampannā ceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca nirudakapāyāsassa
analyzed: viya pathavī saṇṭhāti sā vaṇṇa sampannā ca iva hoti gandha rasa sampannā ca nirudaka pāyāsassa

original: upari paṭalaṃ viya. Ettha pana mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ vinassamāne loke pacchā vinassati,
analyzed: upari paṭalam viya ettha pana mahā bodhi pallaṅka ṭṭhānam vinassamāne loke pacchā vinassati

original: saṇṭhahamāne paṭhamaṃ saṇṭhahatīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṇṭhahamāne paṭhamam saṇṭhahati iti veditabbam

original: Tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā
analyzed: tadā ca ābhassara brahma loke paṭhamatara abhinibbattā sattā āyu khayā vā puñña kkhayā

original: vā tato cavitvā opapātikā hutvā idhūpapajjanti, te honti sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā,
analyzed: vā tatas cavitvā opapātikāḥ hutvā idhu upapajjanti te honti sayaṃpabhāḥ antalikkha carā

original: te taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakārakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
analyzed: te tam rasa pathavim sāyitvā taṇhā abhibhūtāḥ āluppa kārakam paribhuñjitum upakkamanti

original: Atha tesaṃ sayaṃpabhā antaradhāyati, andhakāro hoti. Te andhakāraṃ disvā bhāyanti.
analyzed: atha tesam sayaṃpabhāḥ antaradhāyati andhakāraḥ te andhakāram disvā bhāyanti

original: Tato tesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaññāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: tatas tesam bhayam nāsetvā sūra bhāvam janayantam paripuṇṇa paññāsa yojanam sūriya maṇḍalam

original: pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhītānaṃ
analyzed: pātubhavati te tam disvā ālokam paṭilabhimha iti haṭṭha tuṭṭhāḥ hutvā amhākam bhītānam

original: bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito, tasmā sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
analyzed: bhayam nāsetvā sūra bhāvam janayantaḥ uṭṭhitaḥ tasmai sūriyaḥ hotu uti nāmam karonti

original: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate “yampi ālokaṃ labhimha, sopi no naṭṭho”ti
analyzed: atha sūriye divasam ālokam katvā atthaṅgate yam pi ālokam labhimha saḥ upi no naṭṭho ti

original: puna bhītā honti. Tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “sādhu vatassa, sace aññaṃ ālokaṃ labheyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: puna bhītāḥ honti tesam evam hoti sādhu vatassa sace aññam ālokam labheyyāma ati

original: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati. Te taṃ disvā
analyzed: tesam cittam ñatvā viyaḥ ekūna paññāsa yojanam canda maṇḍalam pātubhavati te tam disvā

original: bhiyyoso mattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito, tasmā cando
analyzed: bhiyyosaḥ mattāya haṭṭha tuṭṭhā hutvā amhākam chandam ñatvā viyas uṭṭhitaḥ tasmā cando

original: hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
analyzed: hotu uti nāmam karonti

original: Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti, tato pabhuti
analyzed: evam candima sūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tāraka rūpāni pātubhavanti tatas pabhuti

original: rattindivā paññāyanti, anukkamena ca māsaḍḍhamāsautusaṃvaccharā, candimasūriyānaṃ
analyzed: rattin divā paññāyanti anukkamena ca candima sūriyānam

original: pātubhūtadivaseyeva sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā dīpasamuddā ca pātubhavanti.
analyzed: pātubhūta divasā iya iva sineru cakkavāḷa himavanta pabbatāḥ dīpa samuddāḥ ca pātubhavanti

original: Te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ? Yathā
analyzed: te ca kho apubbam acarimam phagguṇa puṇṇam a divaseya iva pātubhavanti katham yathā

original: nāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva pubbuḷakā uṭṭhahanti, eke padesā thūpathūpā
analyzed: nāma kaṅgu bhatte paccamāne eka ppahārena iva pubbuḷakāḥ uṭṭhahanti eke padesā thūpa thūpā

original: honti, eke ninnaninnā, eke samasamā, evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne pabbatā honti, ninnaninnaṭṭhāne
analyzed: honti eke ninna ninnāḥ eke samasamāḥ evam eva thūpa thūpa ṭhāne pabbatāḥ honti ninna ninna ṭhāne

original: samuddā, samasamaṭṭhāne dīpāti.
analyzed: samuddā sama sama ṭṭhāne dīpāti

original: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto honti,
analyzed: atha tesam sattānam rasa pathavim paribhuñjantānam kammena ekacce vaṇṇavantaḥ honti

original: ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti. Tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti, tesaṃ atimānapaccayā
analyzed: ekacce dubbaṇṇāḥ honti tattha vaṇṇavantaḥ dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti tesam atimāna paccayā

original: sāpi rasapathavī antaradhāyati, bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati. Atha nesaṃ teneva nayena
analyzed: sā api rasa pathavī antaradhāyati bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati atha tena iva nayena

original: sopi antaradhāyati, atha padālatā pātubhavati. Teneva nayena sāpi antaradhāyati,
analyzed: sā upi antaradhāyati atha padālatā pātubhavati tena iva nayena sā api antaradhāyati

original: akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso sugandho taṇḍulaphalo. Tato nesaṃ bhājanāni
analyzed: a kaṭṭha pāko pātubhavati a kaṇaḥ athusaḥ su gandho taṇḍula phalo bhājanāni

original: uppajjanti. Te sāliṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapenti, sayameva jālasikhā
analyzed: uppajjanti te sālim bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇa piṭṭhiyam ṭhapenti sayam eva jālasikhā

original: uṭṭhahitvā taṃ pacati. So hoti odano sumanajātipupphasadiso, na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā tam pacati saḥ hoti odanaḥ sumana jāti puppha sadisaḥ na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena

original: vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi, yaṃ yaṃ rasaṃ bhuñjitukāmā honti, taṃtaṃrasova hoti. Tesaṃ taṃ
analyzed: vā karaṇīyam atthi yam yam rasam bhuñjitu kāmāḥ honti taṃ taṃ rasaḥ uva hoti tesam taṃ

original: oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharayataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati. Tathā hi rasapathavī
analyzed: oḷārikam āhāram tatas pabhuti mutta karīsam sañjāyati tathā hi rasa pathavī

original: bhūmipappaṭako padālatāti ime tāva paribhuttā sudhāhāro viya khudaṃ vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi
analyzed: ime tāva paribhuttā sudhā āhāraḥ viya khudam vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi

original: rasameva paribyūhentā tiṭṭhanti vatthuno sukhumabhāvena, na nissandā, sukhumabhāveneva
analyzed: rasam eva paribyūhentā tiṭṭhanti vatthuno sukhuma bhāvena na nissandā sukhuma bhāvena iva

original: gahaṇindhanameva ca hoti. Odano pana paribhutto rasaṃ vaḍḍhentopi vatthuno oḷārikabhāveneva
analyzed: ca hoti odanaḥ pana paribhuttaḥ rasam vaḍḍhentaḥ api vatthuno oḷārika bhāvena iva

original: nissandaṃ vissajjento passāvaṃ karīsañca uppādeti.
analyzed: nissandam vissajjentaḥ passāvam karīsam ca uppādeti

original: Atha tesaṃ nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti. Purisassa purisabhāvo, itthiyā
analyzed: atha tesam nikkhamana thāya vaṇa mukhāni pabhijjanti purisassa purisa bhāvaḥ itthiyā

original: itthibhāvo pātubhavati. Purimattabhāvesu hi pavattaupacārajjhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantānesu
analyzed: itthi bhāvaḥ pātubhavati purimatta bhāvesu hi pavatta aupacāra jhāna anubhāvena yāva satta santānesu

original: kāmarāgo vikkhambhanavegena samito, na tāva bahalakāmarāgūpanissayāni itthipurisindriyāni
analyzed: kāma rāgaḥ vikkhambhana vegena samitaḥ na tāva bahala kāma rāga upanissayāni itthi purisa indriyāni

original: pāturahesuṃ. Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya bahalakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi, tadā tadupanissayāni
analyzed: yadā pana assa vicchinna tāya bahala kāma rāgaḥ laddha avasaraḥ ahosi tadā tad upanissayāni

original: tāni sattānaṃ attabhāvesu sañjāyiṃsu, tadā itthī purisaṃ, puriso ca itthiṃ ativelaṃ
analyzed: tāni sattānam atta bhāvesu tadā itthī purisam purisaḥ ca itthim ativelam

original: upanijjhāyati. Tesaṃ ativelaṃ upanijjhāyanapaccayā kāmapariḷāho uppajjati, tato methunaṃ
analyzed: upanijjhāyati tesam ativelam upanijjhāyana paccayā kāma pariḷāhaḥ uppajjati tatas methunam

original: dhammaṃ paṭisevanti. Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā
analyzed: dhammam paṭisevanti te asat dhamma paṭisevana paccayāḥ viññūhi garahiyamānāḥ viheṭhiyamānāḥ

original: tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti. Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena
analyzed: tassa asat dhammassa paṭicchādana hetu agārāni karonti te agāram ajjhāvasamānāḥ anukkamena

original: aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti. Tato
analyzed: aññatarassa alasa jātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatim āpajjantā sannidhim karonti tatas

original: pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonandhanti, lāyitaṭṭhānampi na paṭiviruhati.
analyzed: kaṇaḥ upi thusaḥ upi taṇḍulam pariyonandhanti lāyita ṭṭhānam pi na paṭiviruhati

original: Te sannipatitvā anutthunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā, mayañhi pubbe
analyzed: te sannipatitvā anutthunanti pāpakāḥ vata bho dhammāḥ sattesu pātubhūtāḥ mayan hi pubbe

original: manomayā ahumhā”ti, aggaññasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. Tato mariyādaṃ ṭhapenti,
analyzed: manaḥ mayāḥ ahumha ati aggañña sutte vutta nayena vitthāretabbam tatas mariyādam ṭhapenti

original: athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati, taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsetvā tatiyavāre
analyzed: athaññataraḥ sattaḥ aññassa bhāgam a dinnam ādiyati tam dvi khattum paribhāsetvā tatiya vāre

original: pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti. Te evaṃ adinnādāne kalahamusāvādadaṇḍādānesu uppannesu
analyzed: pāṇi leḍḍu daṇḍehi paharanti te evam adinnādāne kalaha musāvāda daṇḍa ādānesu uppannesu

original: ca sannipatitvā cintayanti “yannūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma, yo no sammā
analyzed: ca sannipatitvā cintayanti yat nūna mayam ekam sattam sammanneyyāma yaḥ no sammā

original: khīyitabbaṃ khīyeyya, garahitabbaṃ garaheyya, pabbājetabbaṃ pabbājeyya, mayaṃ panassa
analyzed: khīyitabbam khīyeyya garahitabbam garaheyya pabbājetabbam pabbājeyya mayam panassa

original: sālīnaṃ bhāgamanuppadassāmā”ti. Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva
analyzed: sālīnam bhāgam anuppadassāma ati evam kata sanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmin tāva

original: kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca
analyzed: kappe ayam eva bhagavā bodhisatta bhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataraḥ ca

original: dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ.
analyzed: dassanīyataraḥ ca mahesakkhataraḥ ca buddhi sampannaḥ paṭibalaḥ niggaha paggaham kātum

original: Te taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammanniṃsu. So tena mahājanena sammatoti mahāsammato,
analyzed: te tam upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammanniṃsu saḥ tena mahājanena sammataḥ iti mahā sammataḥ

original: khettānaṃ adhipatīti khattiyo, dhammena samena paresaṃ rañjetīti rājāti tīhi nāmehi
analyzed: khettānam adhipati iti khattiyaḥ dhammena samena paresam rañjeti iti rājā ati tīhi nāmehi

original: paññāyittha. Yañhi loke acchariyaṭṭhānaṃ, bodhisattova tattha ādipurisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ
analyzed: paññāyittha yat hi loke acchariya ṭṭhānam bodhisatto va tattha ādi puriso ti evam bodhisattam

original: ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṃsu.
analyzed: ādim katvā khattiya maṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ api vaṇṇāḥ saṇṭhahiṃsu

original: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva jālopacchedo, idamekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭoti
analyzed: tattha kappa vināsaka mahā meghataḥ yāva jāla upacchedaḥ idam ekam asaṅkhyeyyam saṃvaṭṭoti

original: vuccati. Kappavināsakajālopacchedato yāva koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparipūrako sampattimahāmegho,
analyzed: vuccati kappa vināsaka jāla upacchedataḥ yāva koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷa paripūrako sampatti mahā megho

original: idaṃ dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo,
analyzed: idam dutiyam asaṅkhyeyyam saṃvaṭṭa ṭhāyi iti vuccati sampatti mahā meghataḥ yāva candima sūriya pātubhāvaḥ

original: idaṃ tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭoti vuccati. Candimasūriyapātubhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho,
analyzed: idam tatiyam asaṅkhyeyyam vivaṭṭo ti vuccati candima sūriya pātubhāvataḥ yāva puna

original: idaṃ catutthamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyaṃ catusaṭṭhiantarakappasaṅgahaṃ.
analyzed: idam catuttham asaṅkhyeyyam vivaṭṭa ṭṭhāyī iti vuccati vivaṭṭa ṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyam catur aṭṭhi antara kappa saṅgaham

original: “Vīsatiantarakappasaṅgaha”nti keci. Sesāsaṅkhyeyyāni kālato tena samappamāṇāneva.
analyzed: vīsati antara kappa saṅgahanti keci sesa asaṅkhyeyyāni kālato tena

original: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ tāva agginā vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni ekaḥ mahā kappaḥ hoti evam tāva agginā vināsaḥ ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbam

original: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti
analyzed: yasmin pana samaye kappaḥ udakena nassati āditas va kappa vināsaka mahā meghaḥ vuṭṭhahitvā ati

original: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
analyzed: pubbe vutta nayena iva vitthāretabbam ayam pana visesaḥ yathā tattha dutiya sūriyaḥ

original: evamidha kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti. So ādito sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassanto
analyzed: evam idha kappa vināsakaḥ khārudaka mahā megho vuṭṭhāti saḥ āditas sukhumam sukhumam vassanto

original: anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānaṃ pūrento vassati. Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā
analyzed: anukkamena mahā dhārāhi koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷānam pūrentaḥ vassati khāru dakena phuṭṭha phuṭṭhā

original: pathavīpabbatādayo vilīyanti, udakaṃ samantato vātehi dhārīyati. Pathaviyā heṭṭhimantato
analyzed: pathavī pabbata ādayaḥ vilīyanti udakam samantataḥ vātehi dhārīyati pathaviyāḥ heṭṭhimantataḥ

original: pabhuti yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ udakaṃ gaṇhāti. Tena hi khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā
analyzed: yāva dutiya jhāna bhūmim udakam gaṇhāti tena hi khāru dakena phuṭṭha phuṭṭhā

original: pathavīpabbatādayo udake pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya vilīyanteva, tasmā pathavīsandhārakaudakena
analyzed: pathavī pabbata ādayaḥ udake pakkhitta loṇa sakkharāḥ viya vilīyanta iva tasmā pathavī sandhāraka odakena

original: saddhiṃ ekūdakameva taṃ hotīti keci. Apare pana “pathavīsandhārakaudakaṃ taṃ sandhārakavāyukkhandhañca
analyzed: ekūdakam eva tam hoti iti keci apare pana pathavī sandhāraka odakam tam sandhāraka vāyu khandham ca

original: anavasesato vināsetvā sabbattha sayameva eko ghanabhūto tiṭṭhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ
analyzed: anavasesataḥ vināsetvā sabbattha sayam eva ekaḥ ghana bhūto tiṭṭhati iti vadanti tam

original: yuttaṃ. Upari pana chapi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subhakiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati, taṃ yāva
analyzed: upari pana brahmaloke vilīya apetvā subha kiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati tam yāva

original: aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ atthi, tāva na vūpasammati, udakānugataṃ pana sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ
analyzed: aṇumattam pi saṅkhāra gatam atthi tāva na vūpasammati udaka anugatam pana sabbam saṅkhāra gatam

original: abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasammati, antaradhānaṃ gacchati. Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso
analyzed: abhibhavitvā sahasā antaradhānam gacchati heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāsaḥ

original: eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Kevalaṃ panidha ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ hoti mahandhakāro ti sabbam vutta sadisam kevalam panidhe ābhassara brahma lokam

original: ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati. Subhakiṇhato cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti.
analyzed: ādim katvā loko pātubhavati subha kiṇhataḥ cavitvā ābhassara ṭṭhāna ādīsu sattāḥ nibbattanti

original: Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakakhārudakopacchedo, idamekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
analyzed: kappa vināsaka mahā meghataḥ yāva kappa vināsaka khārudaka upacchedaḥ idam ekam asaṅkhyeyyam

original: Udakupacchedato yāva sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Sampattimahāmeghato
analyzed: udak upacchedataḥ yāva sampatti mahā meghaḥ idam dutiyam asaṅkhyeyyam sampatti mahā meghato

original: yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Candimasūriyapātubhāvato yāva
analyzed: idam tatiyam asaṅkhyeyyam candima sūriya pātubhāvataḥ yāva

original: kappavināsakamahaāmegho, idaṃ catutthamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
analyzed: idam catuttham asaṅkhyeyyam imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni

original: eko mahākappo hoti. Evaṃ udakena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ekaḥ mahā kappaḥ hoti evam udakena vināsaḥ ca saṇṭhahanam ca veditabbam

original: Yasmiṃ samaye kappo vātena nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti
analyzed: yasmin samaye kappaḥ vātena nassati āditas va kappa vināsaka mahā meghaḥ vuṭṭhahitvā ati

original: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
analyzed: pubbe vutta nayena iva vitthāretabbam ayam pana visesaḥ yathā tattha dutiya sūriyaḥ

original: evamidha kappavināsanatthaṃ vāto samuṭṭhāti. So paṭhamaṃ thūlarajaṃ uṭṭhāpeti, tato
analyzed: evam idha kappa vināsana attham vāto samuṭṭhāti saḥ paṭhamam thūla rajam uṭṭhāpeti tatas

original: saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ thūlavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāvakūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇe
analyzed: saṇhara jam sukhuma vālikam thūla vālikam yāvakūṭāgāra matte pāsāṇe

original: visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti. Te pathavito nabhamuggatā na puna patanti,
analyzed: visama ṭṭhāne ṭhita mahā rukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti te pathavitaḥ nabham uggatāḥ na puna patanti

original: tattheva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti. Athānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā
analyzed: tattha iva cuṇṇa vicuṇṇāḥ hutvā abhāvam gacchanti atha anukkamena heṭṭhā mahā pathaviyā

original: vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃ mūlaṃ katvā ākāse khipati. Yojanasatappamāṇāpi
analyzed: vātaḥ samuṭṭhahitvā pathavim parivattetvā uddham mūlam katvā ākāse khipati yojana sata ppamāṇā api

original: pathavippadesā dviyojanatiyojanacatuyojanapañcayojanachayojanasattayojanappamāṇāpi
analyzed: patha vippadesā dvi yojana ti yojana catu yojana pañca yojana cha yojana satta yojana ppamāṇā api

original: pabhijjitvā vātavegukkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti. Cakkavāḷapabbatampi
analyzed: pabhijjitvā vāta vegu khittāḥ ākāseya iva cuṇṇa vicuṇṇāḥ hutvā abhāvam gacchanti cakkavāḷa pabbatam pi

original: sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati. Te aññamaññaṃ abhihantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
analyzed: sineru pabbatam pi vātaḥ ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati te aññam aññam abhihantvā cuṇṇa vicuṇṇā

original: hutvā vinassanti. Etenevūpāyena bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ca ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento
analyzed: hutvā vinassanti etena iva upāyena bhūma aṭṭhaka vimānāni ca ākāsa aṭṭhaka vimānāni ca vināsento

original: chakāmāvacaradevaloke vināsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti. Tattha cakkavāḷā
analyzed: cha kāmāvacara deva loke vināsetvā koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷāni vināseti tattha cakkavāḷā

original: cakkavāḷehi, himavantā himavantehi, sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
analyzed: cakkavāḷehi himavantā himavantehi sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññam samāgantvā cuṇṇa vicuṇṇā

original: hutvā vinassanti. Pathavito yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmi vāto gaṇhāti, navapi brahmaloke
analyzed: hutvā vinassanti pathavitaḥ yāva tatiya jhāna bhūmi vātaḥ gaṇhāti nava api brahma loke

original: vināsetvā vehapphale āhacca tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ pathavīsandhārakaudakena taṃsandhārakavātena
analyzed: vināsetvā vehapphale āhacca tiṭṭhati evam pathavī sandhāraka odakena taṃ sandhāraka vātena

original: ca saddhiṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayampi vinassati avaṭṭhānassa kāraṇābhāvato.
analyzed: ca saddhim sabba saṅkhāra gatam vināsetvā sayam pi vinassati avaṭṭhānassa kāraṇa abhāvato

original: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ. Idha pana
analyzed: heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso ekaḥ hoti mahā andhakāro ti sabbam vutta sadisam idha pana

original: subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati. Vehapphalato cavitvā subhakiṇhaṭṭhānādīsu
analyzed: subha kiṇha brahma lokam ādim katvā loko pātubhavati vehapphalataḥ cavitvā subha kiṇha ṭṭhāna ādīsu

original: sattā nibbattanti. Tattha kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakavātupacchedo,
analyzed: sattāḥ nibbattanti tattha kappa vināsaka mahā meghataḥ yāva kappa vināsaka vāta upacchedo

original: idamekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Vātupacchedato yāva sampattimahāmegho, idaṃ dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyantiādi
analyzed: idam ekam asaṅkhyeyyam vāta upacchedataḥ sampatti mahā meghaḥ idam dutiyam asaṅkhyeyya ntiādi

original: vuttanayameva. Evaṃ vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutta nayam eva evam vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanam ca veditabbam

original: Atha kiṃkāraṇā evaṃ loko vinassati. Yadipi hi saṅkhārānaṃ ahetuko sarasanirodho vināsakābhāvato,
analyzed: atha kiṃkāraṇā evam lokaḥ vinassati yadi api hi saṅkhārānam ahetukaḥ sa rasa nirodhaḥ vināsaka abhāvato

original: santānanirodho pana hetuvirahito natthi. Yathā taṃ sattanikāyesūti bhājanalokassapi
analyzed: santāna nirodhaḥ pana hetu virahitaḥ natthi yathā tam satta nikāyesu iti bhājana lokassa api

original: sahetukena vināsena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā kimevaṃ lokavināse kāraṇanti? Akusalamūlaṃ
analyzed: sa hetukena vināsena bhavitabbam tasmā kim evam loka vināse kāraṇan ti akusala mūlam

original: evaṃ tesaṃ pāpakammabalena saṃvaṭṭati, tasmā akusalamūlesu ussannesu evaṃ loko vinassati.

analyzed: saḥ etassa atthi iti satthā satthavāhaḥ nirutti nayena saḥ viya bhagavā iti āha satthā

analyzed: viyāti satthā bhagavā satthavāhā iti

original: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idāni tam attham niddesa pāḷi nayena dassetum yathā satthavāhaḥ tiādi vuttam tattha

original: sammattaniyāmokkamanassa yogyapuggalassa paricchindanavasena. Bhagavatoti nissakke

original: sāmivacanaṃ yathā “upajjhāyato ajjhetī”ti. Bhagavato santike vāti attho. Upanissayasampattinti

analyzed: a passantaḥ tattha daṇḍam uppīḍetvā aṭṭhāsi maṇḍūko pi daṇḍe ṭhapite api uppīḍite api dhamma gatena

original: māroti devaputtamāro. Sattānaṃ jīvitassa jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā

original: maccu eva māroti maccumāro. Tattha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena

original: Satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassāti aneka sata puñña nibbattamahā purisalakkhaṇadharassa.

original: itarāsaṃ phalasampadānaṃ mūlabhāvato adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca. Dīpitā hotīti idaṃ dhammakāyasampattītiādīsupi

original: yojetabbaṃ. Tattha pahānasampadāpubbakattā ñāṇasampadādīnaṃ dhammakāyasampatti dīpitā

original: paresupi yathākkamaṃ yojanā veditabbā.

original: adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā

original: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
analyzed: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi sā ca ssa abhipatthanā yathā adhippeta phala āvahā ahosi

original: Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā.

analyzed: bhajīyanti iti bhagāḥ lokiya lokuttara sampattiyaḥ tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito

analyzed: pubbe bodhisatta bhūto paramukkaṃsa gate vani bhaji sevi yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato

analyzed: anañña sādhāraṇe lokuttare pi vani bhaji sevi vittārataḥ pana

original: Kathaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. Tathāgato

analyzed: pasāretvā mā iti kattuatthe sāmi vacananti āha mayā sutanti jāti brāhmaṇa iti jātiyā

original: Kittako pana soti āha “dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe”ti, dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rājūnaṃ rajjapasāsanapaṭipāṭiyoti

analyzed: attho addha gatā iti vatvā katham vayaḥ gahaṇam osāna vayā apekkhanti āha pacchima vayam

original: anuppatte”ti. Pacchimo tatiyabhāgoti sattasaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo koṭṭhāso.

analyzed: na abhivādetabbanti sallakkheti iti vuttam hoti

original: vatthuārammaṇādikāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ. Anukkhipantoti attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa

original: Aviruḷhidhammattāti aviruḷhisabhāvatāya. Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto

original: asambhavato. Niddeseti mahāniddese. Tattha hi “uddānato dve kāmā vatthukāmā kilesakāmā

original: upanijjhāyanakicca”ntiādi. Tathalakkhaṇanti avināsadhammassa nibbānassa anaññathābhāvato

original: aviparītasabhāvo tathalakkhaṇaṃ, maggassapi vā nibbānārammaṇato tathalakkhaṇūpanijjhānatā yojetabbā.
analyzed: aviparīta sabhāvaḥ tatha lakkhaṇam maggassa api vā nibbāna ārammaṇato tatha lakkhaṇa upanijjhāna tā yojetabbā

original: Visadisodāharaṇaṃ tāva dassento āha “yathā sadhano”tiādi. Añño apadesāraho hotīti
analyzed: visadisa udāharaṇam tāva dassentaḥ āha yathā sa dhana utiādi aññaḥ apadesa arahaḥ hoti iti

original: dhanato parijanato ca añño dhanavā parijanavā ca puriso saha dhanena vattati parijanena

original: cāti sadhano saparijanoti apadesaṃ arahatīti apadesāraho hoti, apadisitabbo hotīti
analyzed: ca ati sa dhanaḥ sa parijanaḥ iti apadesam arahati iti apadesa arahaḥ hoti apadisitabbaḥ hoti iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Senaṅgesu eva senāsammutīti rathādisenaṅgavinimuttāya senāya abhāvepi
analyzed: vuttam hoti senaṅgesu eva senā sammuti iti ratha ādi senaṅga vinimuttāya senāya abhāve pi

original: rathehi pattīhi ca saha vattanato sarathā sapatti senāti rathādisenaṅgesuyeva senāvohāroti
analyzed: rathehi pattīhi ca saha vattanato sa rathā sa patti senā ati senā vohāraḥ iti

original: attho. Kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha
analyzed: atthaḥ kasmā pana ittha jhāna pāṭhe aggahitā citta ekagga tā gahitā iti anuyogam sandhāya āha

original: “avuttattā”tiādi. Evaṃ vuttāyevāti evaṃ sarūpato vibhaṅge vuttāyeva. Sacittekaggatanti
analyzed: a vutta ttā ati ādi evam vuttāya iva ati evam sarūpataḥ vibhaṅge vuttāya iva sa citta ekagga tat ti

original: idha avuttepīti “sacittekaggata”nti evaṃ sarūpato imasmiṃ jhānapāṭhe avuttepīti attho,
analyzed: idha a vutte api iti evam sarūpataḥ imasmin jhāna pāṭhe a vutte api iti attho

original: sāmaññato pana jhānaggahaṇena gahitā eva. Tenevāha “yena hī”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
analyzed: sāmaññato pana jhāna ggahaṇena gahitāḥ eva tena iva āha yena hi itiādi idam vuttam hoti

original: – yena vitakkādīhi saha vattabbaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena “savitakkaṃ
analyzed: yena vitakka ādīhi saha vattabbam tam dhammam dīpetum tassa pakāsana adhippāyena sa vitakkam

original: savicāra”ntiādinā uddeso kato, so eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge “cittassekaggatā”ti
analyzed: uddeso kato so eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge cittassa ekagga tā ti

original: niddisantena pakāsito, tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbanti.
analyzed: niddisantena pakāsitaḥ tasmā sā jhāna pāṭhe aggahitā iti na cintetabbanti

original: Upasampajjāti ettha upa-saṃsaddā “upalabbhatī”tiādīsu viya niratthakāti dassetuṃ
analyzed: upasampajja ati ettha upasaṃsaddā upalabbhati iti ādīsu viya niratthakā ati dassetum

original: “upagantvā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna tesaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “upasampādayitvā”tiādi

original: vuttaṃ, tasmā upasampajjāti ettha patvā sādhetvāti vā attho. Iriyanti kiriyaṃ. Vuttintiādīni
analyzed: vuttam tasmai upasampajja āti ettha patvā sādhetvā ati vā attho iriyanti kiriyam vutti nti ādīni

original: tasseva vevacanāni. Ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ iriyāpathantarehi rakkhaṇaṃ pālanaṃ.
analyzed: tassa iva vevacanāni ekam iriyāpatha bādhanam iriyāpatha antarehi rakkhaṇam pālanam

original: Sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇattā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānameva vuttaṃ. Tañhi sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti vadanti.
analyzed: sabba buddhānam āciṇṇa ttā āna apāna ssati kammaṭṭhānam eva vuttam tat hi sabba buddhānam āciṇṇam ti vadanti

original: Paṭhamajjhānakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Dutiyajjhānakathā
analyzed: dutiya jhāna kathā

original: Vūpasamāti vūpasamahetu. Vūpasamoti cettha pahānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañca vitakkavicārānaṃ
analyzed: vūpasamā ati vūpasama hetu vūpasamaḥ ti ca ittha pahānam adhippetam tat ca

original: atikkamo atthato dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe anuppādoti āha “samatikkamā”tiādi. Katamesaṃ
analyzed: atikkamaḥ atthataḥ dutiya jhāna kkhaṇe anuppādaḥ ti āha samatikkama atiādi katamesam

original: panettha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo adhippeto, kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, udāhu dutiyajjhānikānanti,
analyzed: pana ittha vitakka vicārānam vūpasamaḥ adhippeto kim paṭhama jhānikānam udāhu dutiya jhānikānam ti

original: kiñcettha – yadi paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, natthi tesaṃ vūpasamo. Na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ

original: vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi. Atha dutiyajjhānikānaṃ, evampi nattheva vūpasamo sabbena
analyzed: vitakka vicāra rahitam atthi atha dutiya jhānikānam evam pi nattha iva vūpasamaḥ sabbena

original: sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Yasmā
analyzed: sabbam tesam tattha abhāvato ti imam anuyogam sandhāya āha tattha kiñcā api itiādi yasmā

original: diṭṭhādīnavassa taṃtaṃjhānakkhaṇe anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
analyzed: diṭṭha ādīnavassa taṃ taṃ jhāna kkhaṇe anuppatti dhamma tā āpādanam vūpasamanam adhippetam

original: vitakkādayo eva ca jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti, na taṃsampayuttā phassādayo, tasmā
analyzed: vitakka ādayaḥ eva ca tathā na phassa ādayaḥ

original: vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamādhivacanaṃ jhāne āgataṃ. Yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi

original: “etena etaṃ oḷārika”nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ, tasmā avisesena vitakkādīnaṃ
analyzed: etena etam oḷārikam ti ādīnava dassanam sutte āgatam tasmai avisesena vitakka ādīnam

original: taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno adhikavacanaṃ

original: aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti katvā kañci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassento “oḷārikassa panā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: aññam attham bodheti iti katvā kañci visesam dīpeti iti dassentaḥ oḷārikassa pana atiādim āha

original: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yehi vitakkavicārehi paṭhamajjhānassa oḷārikatā, tesaṃ samatikkamā
analyzed: ayam ha ittha adhippāyaḥ yehi vitakka vicārehi paṭhamajjhānassa oḷārika tā tesam samatikkamā

original: dutiyajjhānassa samadhigamo, na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ samatikkamāti
analyzed: dutiya jhānassa samadhigamaḥ na sabhāvataḥ anoḷārikānam phassa ādīnam samatikkamāti

original: ayamattho “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etena dīpito, tasmā “kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ vitakka vicārānam etena dīpitaḥ tasmā kim paṭhama jhānikānam

original: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo idhādhippeto, udāhu dutiyajjhānikāna”nti edisī codanā anokāsāva.
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamaḥ idha adhippetaḥ udāhu dutiya jhānikānam ti edisī codanā

original: “Pītiyā ca virāgā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā vitakkavicārapītisukhasamatikkamavacanāni
analyzed: ca virāga ati ādīsu pi esa iva tasmā vitakka vicāra pīti sukha sama ti kama vacanāni

original: oḷārikoḷārikaṅgasamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakānīti tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanaṃ
analyzed: oḷārika uḷārika aṅga samatikkamāḥ dutiya ādi adhigama dīpakāni iti tesam eka desa bhūtam vitakka vicāra samatikkama vacanam

original: avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇanayena taṃ dīpakaṃ vuttaṃ. Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike
analyzed: avayavena samudāya upalakkhaṇa nayena tam dīpakam vuttam visum visum ṭhite api hi vitakka vicāra sama tikkama vacana ādike

original: paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena cittena samūhato gahite vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanassa
analyzed: cittena samūhataḥ gahite vitakka vicāra vūpasama vacanassa

original: tadekadesatā hotīti. Atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva taṃsamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakena
analyzed: tad eka desa tā hoti iti atha vā vitakka vicāra vūpasama vacanena iva dutiya ādi adhigama dīpakena

original: pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ pītiādisamatikkamā tatiyādiadhigamadīpakatā dīpitā hotīti tassa
analyzed: pīti virāga ādi vacanānam pīti ādi samatikkamā tatiya ādi adhigama dīpaka tā dīpitā hoti iti tassa

original: taṃdīpakatā vuttā. Evañhi avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇaṃ vinā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena
analyzed: tad dīpaka tā vuttā evam hi avayavena samudāya upalakkhaṇam vinā vitakka vicāra vūpasama vacanena

original: pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ savisaye samānabyāpāratā dassitā hoti.
analyzed: pīti virāga ādi vacanānam sa visaye samāna byāpāra tā dassitā hoti

original: Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ, na ajjhattajjhattādīti dassento āha “ajjhattanti
analyzed: ajjhattam ti niyaka ajjhattam adhippetam na ajjhatta ajjhatta ādi iti dassentaḥ āha ajjhattam ti

original: niyakajjhattaṃ adhippeta”nti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “vibhaṅge panā”tiādi. Pana-saddopi
analyzed: niyaka jjhattam adhippetanti tattha kāraṇam āha vibhaṅge pana atiādi pana saddaḥ api

original: apisaddattho, vibhaṅgepīti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho.
analyzed: api sadda atthaḥ vibhaṅge pi iti atthaḥ ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ

original: Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyāti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Imasmiñca
analyzed: nīla vaṇṇa yogataḥ nīla vattham viyāti nīla yogataḥ vattham nīlam viyāti adhippāyaḥ imasmin ca

original: atthavikappeti “ceto sampasādayatī”ti etasmiṃ pakkhe. Cetasoti ca upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
analyzed: attha vikappeti cetaḥ sampasādayati iti etasmin pakkhe cetasā iti ca upayoga atthe sāmi vacanam

original: Purimasminti “sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādana”nti vuttapakkhe. Cetasoti sambandhe
analyzed: purimasmin ti sampasādana yogataḥ jhānam pi sampasādananti vutta pakkhe cetasaḥ iti sambandhe

original: sāmivacanaṃ. “Yāva na pare ekagate karomī”tiādīsu seṭṭhavacanopi ekasaddo loke dissatīti
analyzed: sāmi vacanam yāva na pare eka gate karomi iti ādīsu seṭṭha vacanaḥ api eka saddo loke dissati iti

original: āha “seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccatī”ti. “Ekākīhi khuddakehi jita”ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi
analyzed: āha seṭṭhaḥ api hi loke ekaḥ ti vuccati iti ekākīhi khuddakehi jita nti ādīsu asahāya tthaḥ api

original: ekasaddo diṭṭhoti āha “eko asahāyo hutvā”ti. Saddhādayopi kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ
analyzed: eka saddaḥ diṭṭhaḥ ti āha ekaḥ asahāyaḥ hutvā iti saddhā ādayaḥ api kāmam sampayutta dhammānam

original: avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ paccayo hotīti dassento “sampayuttadhamme…pe… adhivacana”nti āha.
analyzed: avikkhepa lakkhaṇe sa atisayam paccayaḥ hoti iti dassento sampayutta dhamma īpe adhivacanam ti āha

original: “Sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāva”nti visesanadvayaṃ jhānassa atisayavacanicchāvasena
analyzed: sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvanti visesana dvayam jhānassa atisaya vacanicchā vasena

analyzed: visesam dassetum nanu ca atiādi vuttam ārammaṇe āhanana pariyāhanana vasena anumajjana anuyujjana vasena

original: ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena kilesakālussiyāpagame sampayuttānaṃ

original: kiñci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ “vitakkavicārakkhobhena…pe…
analyzed: kiñci khobham karontāḥ viya tehi ca te na sannisinnāḥ honti iti vuttam

original: na suppasanna”nti. Tattha khuddikā ūmiyo vīciyo, mahatiyo taraṅgā. Samādhipi na suṭṭhu
analyzed: na su pasannanti tattha khuddikāḥ ūmiyaḥ vīciyaḥ mahatiyaḥ taraṅgāḥ na suṭṭhu

original: pākaṭoti satipi indriyasamatte vīriyasamatāya ca teneva khotena sampasādābhāvena
analyzed: satipi indriya samatte vīriya samatāya ca tena iva khotena sampasāda abhāvena

original: ca bahale viya jale maccho samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo. Vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvenāti
analyzed: ca bahale jale na suṭṭhu pākaṭaḥ vitakka vicāra palibodha abhāvena ati

original: ettha yathāvuttakhobho eva palibodho. Evaṃ vuttenāti yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanaṃ,
analyzed: ettha yathā vutta khobhaḥ eva palibodhaḥ evam vuttena ati yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanam

original: yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tāsaṃ eva “saddahanā”tiādinā
analyzed: yassā ca citta ekagga tāya vasena eka udi bhāvanti ca jhānam vuttam tāsam eva saddahana ati ādinā

original: pavattiākāravisesavibhāvanavasena vuttena tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena. Ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanāti
analyzed: pavatti ākāra visesa vibhāvana vasena vuttena tena vibhaṅga pāṭhena ayam attha vaṇṇanā ti

original: “sampasādanayogato, sampasādanato vā sampasādanaṃ. Ekodiṃ bhāvetīti ekodibhāvanti
analyzed: sampasādana yogataḥ sampasādanataḥ vā sampasādanam eka ūdim bhāva iti iti eka ūdi bhāvanti

analyzed: jhānam vuttan ti evam pavattā ayam attha vaṇṇanā aññadatthu saṃsandati ca iva sameti

analyzed: saddhāya iva vuttā cetasaḥ ekodi bhāvanti ca padam uddharitvā yā cittassa saṇṭhiti

original: avaṭṭhitī”tiādinā samādhisseva niddeso kato, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sampasādanaṃ ekodibhāva”nti

original: jhānameva vuttanti aṭṭhakathāya vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ virodho āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati

analyzed: vibhaṅge pi iminā āva adhippāyena niddesassa kata ttā tathā hi yena sampasādanena yogā

original: jhānaṃ “sampasādana”nti vuccati, tasmiṃ “yā saddhā saddahanā”tiādinā dassite sampasādanaṃ

original: jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitā hoti.
analyzed: jhānanti samāna adhikaraṇa niddesena iva tad yogā jhāne tad sadda pavatti dassitā hoti

original: “Ekodibhāva”nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā ekodimhi dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva

original: jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā vuttāva hotīti iminā adhippāyena byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā

original: dhammamattameva niddiṭṭhanti avirodho yutto.
analyzed: dhamma mattam eva niddiṭṭhanti avirodhaḥ yuttaḥ

analyzed: yam pana vuttam ṭīkākārehi ācariya dhammapāla tthera ādīhi yadi ekodī iti samādhissa gahaṇam

original: adhippetaṃ, tadā ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo
analyzed: adhippetam tadā ekodibhāvanti padam uddharitvā samādhissa niddesaḥ na kattabbo

original: siyā. Tasmā ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādanasaddo viya jhāne pavattatīti
analyzed: siyā tasmai eka udi bhāva saddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādana saddaḥ viya jhāne pavattati iti

original: yutta”nti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. Tasmā so aṭṭhakathānirapekkho visuṃyeveko

“Pubbevā”ti vuttattā “kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hotī”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā āha “catunnaṃ

analyzed: sannipatitvā tam a passantaḥ asukaḥ bhikkhu kuhinti pucchitvā nirodham samāpanno ti

original: hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma, tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā yathā paṭhamameva vuṭṭhāti, evaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ.

original: Satthupakkosananti idhāpi satthupakkosanāvajjanameva imassa pubbakiccaṃ, tasmā tampi evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: satthu pakkosananti idha api satthu pakkosana āvajjanam eva imassa pubba kiccam tasmā tam pi evam āvajjitabbam sesam purima nayena iva veditabbam

original: Addhānaparicchedoti jīvitaddhānassa paricchedo. Iminā bhikkhunā addhānaparicchedesu

original: kusalena bhavitabbaṃ, “attano āyusaṅkhārā sattāhaṃ pavattissanti na pavattissantī”ti
analyzed: kusalena bhavitabbam attanaḥ āyu saṅkhārā sattāham pavattissanti na pavattissanti iti

analyzed: idha ṭhitam āneñjappattanti ca vuttan ti āha etesu parisuddha bhāva ādīsu ṭhita ttā

original: Idāni saṅkhepato vuttamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “saddhāpariggahitaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idāni saṅkhepataḥ vuttam eva attham vivaritum saddhā pariggahitam hi itiādi vuttam tattha

analyzed: paññāya upatthambhitam obhāsa gatanti ñāṇa ubhāsa sahagatam obhāsa bhūtena hi yathā vutta samādhāna saṃvaddhitena

analyzed: parisuddha tā pariyodāta tā anaṅgaṇa tā vigata upakkilesa tā mudu bhāvaḥ kamma niya tā āneñja ppattiyā

original: ṭhitatāti imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Atha vā samāhitassa cittassa imāni aṅgānīti

analyzed: samāhitā iti imam aṅga bhāvena aggahetvā ṭhiti āneñja ppattiyaḥ visum gahetvā yathā vuttehi

original: aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatanti attho daṭṭhabbo. Abhinīhārakkhamanti iddhividhādiatthaṃ

original: abhiññāsacchikiriyāyā”ti.
analyzed: abhiññā sacchikiriyāya ati

original: Kāmaṃ nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā eva paṭhamajjhānasamadhigamo, vitakkādivūpasamā eva

analyzed: ca tathā api na tathā te tehi dūrībhūtāḥ apetāḥ vā yathā

analyzed: suṭṭhu vimuttiyā tassa parisuddhi pariyodāta tā ca vuttā iti āha nīvaraṇa pe pariyodātā iti

original: Jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkānanti ettha ācariyadhammapālattherena “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti

original: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ

original: mānamāyāsāṭheyyādīnaṃ. Abhijjhādīnanti ādi-saddenapi tesaṃyeva saṅgaho. Abhijjhā
analyzed: māna māyā sāṭheyya ādīnam abhijjhā ādīnam ti ādi saddena api tesam yeva saṅgahaḥ abhijjhā

original: cettha paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā mānādayo ca tadekaṭṭhā daṭṭhabbā jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānanti

original: anuvattamānattā. Vikkhambhaneyyā pana nīvaraṇaggahaṇena gahitā. Kathaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānena

original: ayujjamānattā. Nanu ca anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttesu ayamattho labbhati oḷārikānaṃyeva
analyzed: nanu ca anaṅgaṇa sutta vattha suttesu ayam atthaḥ labbhati

original: pāpadhammānaṃ tattha adhippetattāti. Saccametaṃ, idha pana adhigatacatutthajjhānassa

original: apadisanaṃ. Tathā hi ‘suttānusārenā’ti vuttaṃ, na pana suttavasenā”ti.

original: Avassañcetamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ adhigatajjhānānampi kesañci icchāvacarānaṃ pavattisabbhāvatoti.

original: Teneva ācariyadhammapālattherena “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti pāṭhaṃ gahetvā “jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkāna”nti
analyzed: tena iva ācariya dhammapāla ttherena jhāna paṭilābha paccayānam ti pāṭham gahetvā jhāna paṭilābha paccanīkānam ti

original: ayaṃ pāṭho paṭikkhitto. Mahāgaṇṭhipade visuddhimaggassa sīhaḷagaṇṭhipadepi ca “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti
analyzed: ayam pāṭhaḥ paṭikkhittaḥ mahāgaṇṭhi pade visuddhi maggassa sīhaḷagaṇṭhi pade pi ca jhāna paṭilābha paccayānam

original: imasseva pāṭhassa attho vutto, tasmā ayameva pāṭho gahetabbo, atthopi cettha yathāvuttanayeneva

original: Iddhipādakabhāvūpagamanenāti iddhiyā pādakabhāvassa padaṭṭhānabhāvassa upagamanena.

analyzed: bhāvanā pāripūriyā ti itas param kattabbassa abhāva vasena abhinīhāra kkhama bhāvanāya

analyzed: a tittika raṭṭhena ca paṇīta bhāvassa upagamanena ubhayam ca etat bhāvanāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇa vacanam

original: visesaṃ sandhāyāha “evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata”nti.
analyzed: visesam sandhāya āha evam pi aṭṭhaṅga samannāgatan ti

original: Pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, tassa vā anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati taṃnissayādipaccayabhūtaṃ
analyzed: pubbenivāsam anussarati tassa vā anussaraṇam pubbenivāsa anussati tad nissaya ādi paccaya bhūtam

original: paṭicca uppajjanato. Pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tadatthāyāti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ

analyzed: vivarantaḥ pubbenivāsam tāva dassetvā tattha sati ñāṇāni dassetum pubbenivāsa uti ādim āha

analyzed: na atthi iti āha nivuttha khandhā ti nivuttha tā ca ittha santāne pavattatā tathābhūtā

analyzed: ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā tattha uppajjitvā vigatā ca honti iti āha nivutthā iti

original: ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā”ti. Evaṃ sasantatipariyāpannadhammavasena

analyzed: vatvā tam vivaritum gocara nivāsena ati ādi vuttam gocara bhūtā api hi gocara asevanāya

analyzed: āsevitāḥ ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena anubhūtāḥ nivutthāḥ nāma honti te pana duvidhā sa para viññāṇa gocara tāya ati

original: ubhayepi te dassetuṃ “attano”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “attano viññāṇena viññātā”ti vatvā

analyzed: dīpana ttham vuttam para viññāṇa viññātā api vā nivutthā iti sambandho na kevalam attanā eva

original: kappasahassampi anussarantiyeva balavapaññattā”ti. Ettako hi tesaṃ abhinīhāroti kappānaṃ
analyzed: kappa sahassam pi anussarantiyā iva balava paññattā ati ettakaḥ hi tesam abhinīhāraḥ ti kappānam

original: satasahassampi tadadhikaṃ ekaṃ dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānīti kālavasena evaṃparimāṇo yathākkamaṃ
analyzed: sata sahassam pi tad adhikam ekam dve ca asaṅkhyeyyāni iti kāla vasena evaṃparimāṇaḥ yathākkamam

original: tesaṃ mahāsāvakaaggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ puññañāṇābhinīhāro, sāvakapaccekabodhipāramitā
analyzed: tesam mahāsāvaka aggasāvaka paccekabuddhānam puñña ñāṇa abhinīhāraḥ sāvaka paccekabodhi pāramitā

original: siddhā. Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhavo,
analyzed: siddhāḥ yadi bodhi sambhāra sambharaṇa kāla paricchinno tesam tesam ariyānam abhiññā ñāṇa vibhavo

original: evaṃ sante buddhānampissa paricchedatā āpannāti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo natthī”ti.
analyzed: evam sante buddhānam pi ssa pariccheda tā āpannā ti āha buddhānam pana paricchedaḥ natthi iti

original: “Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya buddhānaṃ
analyzed: yāvatakam ñeyyam tāvatakam ñāṇanti vacanato sabbaññu taññāṇassa viya buddhānam

original: abhiññāñāṇānampi savisaye paricchedo nāma natthīti tattha yaṃ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti,
analyzed: abhiññā ñāṇānam pi sa visaye paricchedaḥ nāma natthi iti tattha yam yam ñātum icchanti

original: taṃ taṃ jānanti eva. Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede kāraṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā

analyzed: sā ati saya ttā mahā bodhisambhārānam paññāpāramitāya pavatti ānubhāvassa paricchedaḥ nāma

original: natthi, kuto taṃnibbattānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo natthī”ti.
analyzed: natthi kutas tad nibbattānam abhiññā ñāṇānam ti āha buddhānam pana paricchedaḥ natthi iti

original: Atīte “ettakānaṃ kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti evaṃ kālaparicchedo natthi anāgate anāgataṃsañāṇassa
analyzed: atīte ettakānam kappānam asaṅkhyeyyāni iti evam kāla paricchedaḥ na atthi anāgate anāgataṃsañāṇassa

original: viya. Tenāha “yāva icchanti tāva sarantī”ti.
analyzed: tena āha yāvaḥ icchanti tāva saranti iti

original: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ janānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ kālavibhāgato dassetvā idāni ārammaṇaggahaṇavasenassa
analyzed: evam pañcannam janānam pubbenivāsa anussaraṇam kāla vibhāgataḥ dassetvā idāni ārammaṇa ggahaṇa vasena assa

original: pavattivisesaṃ dassento “titthiyā cā”tiādimāha. Khandhapaṭipāṭimeva sarantīti ettha
analyzed: pavatti visesam dassentaḥ titthiyā ca ati ādim āha khandha paṭipāṭim eva saranti iti ettha

original: Keci panettha “iriyāpathapaṭipāṭi khandhapaṭipāṭī”ti vadanti. Vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekato

original: Yathā pana andhā yaṭṭhiṃ amuñcitvā gacchanti, evaṃ te khandhapaṭipāṭiṃ amuñcitvāva
analyzed: yathā pana andhāḥ yaṭṭhim a muñcitvā gacchanti evam te khandha paṭipāṭim a muñcitvā ava

analyzed: saranti iti āha tesam hi andhānam viya icchita padesa ukkamanam natthi iti sāvakā ati pakati sāvakā api

original: anussaranti, cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamanti balavapaññattā, tathā asītimahāsāvakā.

original: Dvinnaṃ pana aggasāvakānaṃ khandhapaṭipāṭikiccaṃ natthi. Ekassa attabhāvassa cutiṃ
analyzed: dvinnam pana aggasāvakānam khandha paṭipāṭi kiccam natthi ekassa atta bhāvassa cutim

original: disvā paṭisandhiṃ passanti, puna aparassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhinti evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasenapi
analyzed: disvā paṭisandhim passanti puna aparassa cutim disvā paṭisandhin ti evam cuti paṭisandhi vasena api

analyzed: saṅkamantāḥ gacchanti yathā nāma sarada samaye ṭhita majjhanhika velāyam catur atanike

original: gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ. Siyā pana

original: tassa sukhumataratirokuṭṭādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā, na tveva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ

original: Tattha sīhokkantavasenāti sīhagatipatanavasena. Yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākaṅkhantīti yasmiṃ

original: Dibbacakkhuñāṇakathā
analyzed: dibba cakkhu ñāṇa kathā

original: “devatānañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sucaritakammanibbattanti saddhābahulatāvisuddhadiṭṭhitāānisaṃsadassāvitādisampattiyā
analyzed: devatānam hi itiādi vuttam tattha su carita kamma nibbattanti

original: suṭṭhu caritattā sucaritena devūpapattijanakena puññakammena nibbattaṃ. Pittasemharuhirādīhīti

analyzed: cakkhu ñāṇa cakkhu tādisam eva ati upakkilesa vimutta tāya dūre pi sukhumassa api ārammaṇassa

original: sampaṭicchanasamatthatāya ca taṃsadisameva.

original: na ca āvajjanaparikammehi vinā mahaggatassa pavatti atthi, nāpi uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ

original: ārammaṇapaccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, bhijjamānaṃ vā, tasmā cutūpapātakkhaṇe rūpaṃ dibbacakkhunā

original: daṭṭhuṃ na sakkāti suvuttametaṃ.
analyzed: daṭṭhum na sakkā ati su vuttam etam

analyzed: yadi dibba cakkhu ñāṇam rūpa ārammaṇam eva atha kasmā satte passāmi iti vuttan ti yebhuyyena

original: sattasantānagatarūpadassanato evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattagahaṇassa vā kāraṇabhāvato vohāravasena
analyzed: satta santāna gata rūpa dassanataḥ evam vuttam satta gahaṇassa vā kāraṇa bhāvataḥ vohāra vasena

original: vuttantipi vadanti. Te cavamānāti adhippetāti sambandho. Evarūpeti na cutūpapātakkhaṇasamaṅginoti
analyzed: vuttam ti pi vadanti te cavamānā ati adhippetā ati sambandhaḥ evarūpā iti na cutūpapāta khaṇa samaṅginaḥ ti

original: adhippāyo. Mohūpanissayaṃ nāma kammaṃ nihīnaṃ nihīnaphalaṃ hotīti āha “mohanissandayuttattā”ti.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ moha upanissayam nāma kammam nihīnam nihīna phalam hoti iti āha moha nissanda yutta ttā ti

original: Mohūpanissayatā ca kusalakammassa pubbabhāge mohappavattibahulatāya veditabbā. Tāya
analyzed: moha upanissaya tā ca kusala kammassa pubba bhāge moha ppavatti bahula tāya veditabbā tāya

original: pana mohappavattiyā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ kusalakammaṃ nihīnameva jātiādiṃ nipphādetīti nihīnajātiādayo

original: Ohīḷiteti visesato garahite. Uññāteti lāmakabhāvena ñāte. Avaññāteti visesato lāmakabhāvena

original: pavatto kathito, tena ca tihetukapaṭisandhike dasseti. Tabbiparīteti tassa hīḷitādibhāvassa

original: Suvaṇṇeti sundaravaṇṇe. Dubbaṇṇeti asundaravaṇṇe. Sā panāyaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā yathākkamaṃ

original: kammassa adosadosūpanissayatāya hotīti āha “adosanissandayuttattā”tiādi. Adosūpanissayatā

analyzed: abhinimminitvā ati ādīsu viya paṭhamam vuttaḥ pana atthaḥ vaṇṇa vasena iva vuttaḥ sundaram

original: gatiṃ gatā sugatāti āha “sugatigate”ti, sugatiṃ upapanneti attho. Alobhajjhāsayā
analyzed: gatim gatā sugatā iti āha sugati gatā iti sugatim upapannā iti atthaḥ alobha jhāsayā

analyzed: katam yathā katam hi kammam phala dāna samattham hoti tathā katam upacitam cavamāna itiādīhi

original: dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti visayamukhena visayibyāpāramāha. Purimehīti “dibbena cakkhunā”tiādīni

original: padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ādīhīti ettha ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tasmā “dibbena…pe…

original: passāmī”ti imehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi ca dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti attho. Iminā pana
analyzed: passāmi iti imehi cavamāna iti ādīhi ca dibba cakkhu kiccam vuttanti atthaḥ iminā pana

original: padenāti “yathākammūpage satte pajānāmī”ti iminā vākyena. Pajjati ñāyati attho imināti hi padaṃ vākyaṃ.

analyzed: tathā hi vakkhati apāya ggahaṇena tiracchānayonim dīpeti itiādi sugati ggahaṇena

analyzed: sandhāya vadati jānam vāti yam upavadati tassa ariya bhāvam jānantaḥ vai a jānam vāti

analyzed: a jānantaḥ vā jānana a jānanam ca ittha appamāṇam ariya bhāvaḥ eva pamāṇam tena āha ubhayathā api

original: na ānantariyaṃ viya atekicchaṃ.

analyzed: āvuso imasmin sāsane patiṭṭhāti pucchi itaraḥ api sacca abhisamayaḥ sāsane patiṭṭhāti

original: payogavipattiyā abhāvo dassito, titikkhāggahaṇena āsayavipattiyā abhāvo. Tathā khantiggahaṇena
analyzed: payoga vipattiyāḥ abhāvaḥ dassito titikkhā ggahaṇena āsaya vipattiyāḥ abhāvo tathā khanti ggahaṇena

original: parāparādhasahatā, titikkhāggahaṇena paresu anaparajjhanā dassitā. Evaṃ kāraṇamukhena
analyzed: para aparādha saha tā titikkhā ggahaṇena paresu anaparajjhanā dassitā evam kāraṇa mukhena

original: anvayato pātimokkhaṃ dassetvā idāni byatirekato taṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: anvayataḥ pātimokkham dassetvā idāni byatirekataḥ tam dassetum na hi itiādi vuttaṃ

original: Tena yathā sattānaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ paraṃ pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi viheṭhanañca “parūpaghāto
analyzed: tena yathā jīvitā voropanam param pāṇi leḍḍu daṇḍa ādīhi viheṭhanam ca

original: paraṃ viheṭhana”nti vuccati, evaṃ tesaṃ sāpateyyāvaharaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ visaṃvādanaṃ

analyzed: uccheda cintanam micchā abhinivesanam ca upaghāto para viheṭhanañca hoti iti yassa kassaci

original: akusalassa kammapathassa kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajito samaṇo ca na hotīti dasseti.
analyzed: akusalassa kamma pathassa kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajitaḥ samaṇo ca na hoti iti dasseti

original: Dutiyagāthāya sabbapāpassāti sabbākusalassa sabbassapi dvādasākusalassa sabbacittuppādasaṅgahitassa
analyzed: dutiya gāthāya sabba pāpassa ati sabba akusalassa sabbassa api dvādasa akusalassa sabba cittuppāda saṅgahitassa

original: sāvajjadhammassa. Akaraṇanti anuppādanaṃ. Karaṇañhi nāma tassa attano santāne uppādananti
analyzed: sāvajja dhammassa a karaṇam ti anuppādanam karaṇam hi nāma tassa attano santāne uppādanam ti

original: hi idaṃ “etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti vakkhamānattā ariyamaggadhamme tesañca sambhārabhūte

original: tebhūmikakusale dhamme bodheti. Upasampadāti upasampādanaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato tassa
analyzed: tebhūmika kusale dhamme bodheti upasampadā ati upasampādanam tam pana atthataḥ tassa

analyzed: kusalassa samadhigamaḥ paṭilābho attanaḥ cittassa jotanam cittassa

original: pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ. Taṃ pana arahattena hoti. Ettha ca yasmā

analyzed: buddhānam sāsanam ovādaḥ anusiṭṭhi

original: Tatiyagāthāya anupavādoti vācāya kassaci anupavadanaṃ. Anupaghātoti kāyena manasā

original: vā sugatibhayehi mokkheti duggatibhayehi, yo vā naṃ pāti, taṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkhanti

original: Pantañca sayanāsananti janasaṅghaṭṭavirahitaṃ nijjanasambādhaṃ vivittaṃ senāsanañca.

original: Ettha dvīhiyeva paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpitoti veditabbo paccayasantosasāmaññena

original: aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ adhicittaṃ, tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ, tasmiṃ

original: yathāvutte adhicitte āyogo ca, anuyogoti attho. Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa

original: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā. Tenāha “eteneva upāyenā”tiādi.
analyzed: imāḥ pana sabba buddhānam pātimokkha uddesa gāthāḥ honti iti veditabbā tena āha etena iva upāyena atiādi

original: Yāva sāsanapariyantāti dharamānakabuddhānaṃ anusāsanapariyantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
analyzed: yāva sāsana pariyantā iti dharamānaka buddhānam anusāsana pariyantam sandhāya vuttam

original: Ādi-saddena saṃyuttādisaṅgaho veditabbo.

analyzed: ca vibhāvana attham tena āha nekkhamma vitakka ādayaḥ tayaḥ vitakke vitakketha atiādi ettha

original: sammāsaṅkappo. So asubhajjhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, asubhajjhāne rūpāvacaro,

original: taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. Byāpādassa paṭipakkho abyāpādo,

original: vitakko abyāpādavitakko. So mettājhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, mettābhāvanāvasena

original: pahūtavittūpakaraṇā, tesaṃ pahūtavittūpakaraṇānaṃ maccharīnaṃ yathā adātukāmatā,

original: evaṃ no adātukāmatāpi natthīti sambandho. Taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti taṃ kāraṇaṃ,

original: taṃ kiccaṃ vā. Etthāti gharāvāse. Dutiye pana atthavikappe tanti deyyadhammassa parāmasanaṃ.

original: Etthāti imasmiṃ temāsabbhantareti attho. Yanti yena kāraṇena, kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā.

original: Dutiye pana atthavikappe yanti yaṃ deyyadhammanti attho.

original: Alaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhacintāyāti saññāpetvāti brāhmaṇa netaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhena

original: tassa ajjhāsayappavatti, tadanurūpāyāti attho. Tassa tadā tādisassa vivaṭṭasannissitassa

original: atthaṃ sandassetvā”ti, paccakkhato vibhāvetvāti attho. Kusale dhammeti tebhūmake
analyzed: attham sandassetvā ti paccakkhatas vibhāvetvā ati attho kusale dhamme iti tebhūmake

original: kusale dhamme. Tatthāti kusaladhamme yathāsamādapite. Nanti brāhmaṇaṃ. Samuttejetvāti
analyzed: kusale dhamme tattha ati kusala dhamme yathā samādapite brāhmaṇam samuttejetvā iti

original: sammadeva uparūpari nivesetvā puññakiriyāya tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ āpādetvā. Taṃ pana
